S06psp_4u:2_0: ity ākārāḥ sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ ity uktā ākārāḥ
S06psp_4u:3_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat,
S06psp_4u:3_1: pūrvajinakṛtādhikārās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:3_7: kaḥ punar vādo ya udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:3_8: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathatvāya pratipatsyante,
S06psp_4u:3_9: bahubuddhaparyupāsitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:3_10: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:3_11_0: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathatvāya pratipatsyante paripṛṣṭhāś ca
S06psp_4u:3_11_1: pūrvakā api taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
S06psp_4u:3_12: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:3_14: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ bahubuddhakoṭīṣu te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:3_15: 9) caritā, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:4_0: atha khalu āyuṣmāñ cchāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4_1: ye bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imām evaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:4_2: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:4_3: yathā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tathā te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā dhārayitavyāḥ.
S06psp_4u:4_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_4u:4_5: na khalu pūrvam acaritena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śakyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktum.
S06psp_4u:4_6_0: ye punar bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratikṣeptavyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4_6_1: maṃsyante pūrvāntato 'pi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_4u:4_7_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4_7_1: nāsti śraddhā nāsti prasādo nāsti prema nāsty adhimuktis taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś
S06psp_4u:4_7_2: ca na buddhā vā bodhisattvā vā pratyekabuddhā vā śrāvakā vā paripraśnīkṛtāḥ,
S06psp_4u:4_8_0: kathaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? kathaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? kathañ ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:4_8_1: caritavyaṃ? kathaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? kathaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ?
S06psp_4u:4_8_2: kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? katham adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? kathaṃ
S06psp_4u:4_8_3: bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? kathara adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caritavyaṃ? yāvat
S06psp_4u:4_8_4: kathaṃ abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāñ caritavyaṃ? kathaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni?
S06psp_4u:4_8_5: kathaṃ samyakprahāṇāni? katham ṛddhipādāḥ? katham indriyāṇi? kathaṃ balāni? kathaṃ
S06psp_4u:4_8_6: bodhyaṅgāni? katham āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ? katham apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_4u:4_8_7: bhāvayitavyāḥ? katham āryasatyāni bhāvayitavyāni? katham aṣṭa vimokṣā bhāvayitavyāḥ?
S06psp_4u:4_8_9: bhāvayitavyāni? kathaṃ ṣaḍ abhijñā bhāvayitavyāḥ? kathaṃ samādhayaḥ samāpattavyāḥ?
S06psp_4u:4_8_10: kathaṃ dhāraṇīmukhāni praveṣṭavyāni? kathaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayitavyāni? kathaṃ
S06psp_4u:4_9: 10) bhāvayitavyāni? kathaṃ pratisaṃvido bhāvayitavyāḥ? katham aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyā? iti.
S06psp_4u:5_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:5_2_0: kim atrāścaryaṃ syāt? ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvānte 'pi nādhimuktā bodhisattvā
S06psp_4u:5_2_1: mahāsattvāḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:5_9: daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu pañcasv abhijñāsu nādhimuktāḥ,
S06psp_4u:5_12: namaskaromi bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai sarvajñajñānasya sa namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā namaskāraṃ karoti.
S06psp_4u:6_0: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:6_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. sarvajñajñānasya sa namaskāraṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:6_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:6_5: sarvajñatāṃ kauśikātikramitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam,
S06psp_4u:6_6_0: evaṃ mārgajñatāyāṃ sthātukāmena sarvākārajñatājñānam utpādayitukāmena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān
S06psp_4u:6_6_2: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam,

S06psp_4u:59_0_1: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ dhārayatāṃ
S06psp_4u:59_1: ye 'pi te śāriputra samantā daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:59_3: te 'pi buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāhariṣyanti anuparigrahīṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:59_4: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartum,
S06psp_4u:59_5: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatām.
S06psp_4u:59_6: tat kasya hetor? na hi śāriputra buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā śaknoty antarāyaḥ kartum.
S06psp_4u:59_7_0: tat kasya hetor? dharmaṃ teṣāṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣv
S06psp_4u:59_7_1: asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyā asaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_4u:59_8: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhato dhārayato vācayata uddiśataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato bhāvayato bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāharanti.
S06psp_4u:60_0_0: veditavyaṃ tena śāriputra kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:60_0_1: likhatā vā dhārayatā vā vācayatā vā uddiśatā vā svādhyāyatā vā yoniśo manasikurvatā
S06psp_4u:60_0_2: vā bhāvayatā vā buddhānubhāvenāham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhāmi dhārayāmi
S06psp_4u:60_0_3: vācayāmi uddiśāmi svādhyāyāmi bhāvayāmi yoniśo manasikaromi.
S06psp_4u:61_0_0: śāriputra āha: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:61_0_1: likhiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati
S06psp_4u:62_0: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_4u:62_1_0: yathā vadasi yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:62_1_1: likhiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati
S06psp_4u:62_1_2: bhāvayiṣyati veditavyaṃ śāriputra sarvan tadbuddhānubhāvena sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā
S06psp_4u:63_0_0: śāriputra āha: jñātās te bhagavan jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te bhagavan
S06psp_4u:63_0_1: māṃsacakṣuṣā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvadigbhāge
S06psp_4u:63_0_2: yāvad daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06psp_4u:63_1_0: teṣāñ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:63_1_1: vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya
S06psp_4u:64_0: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_4u:64_1_0: jñātās te śāriputra jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te śāriputra māṃsacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:64_1_1: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvad
S06psp_4u:64_1_2: daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06psp_4u:64_2_0: teṣāñ ca ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:64_2_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:65_0: te khalu punar mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā abhyāsannī bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:66_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:66_1: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām adhimuktibahulā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:66_2: ye 'pīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_4u:66_3: (PSP_4:28) te 'pi śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca jñātā dṛṣṭāś ca buddhair bhagavadbhis tathāgatāś ca buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti,
S06psp_4u:66_4: teṣām api kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca mahārthaṃ mahānuśaṃsaṃ mahāphalaṃ mahāvipākaṃ ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:66_5: te tena kuśalamūlena na jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:66_6: te na jātv apāyeṣūpapatsyante devamanuṣyeṣūpapatsyamānā buddhabodhisattvair avirahitā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:66_8: te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā tenaiva kuśalamūlena na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:66_9: adhyātmaśūnyatayā bahirdhāśūnyatayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:66_11: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair vimokṣamukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:66_12: aṣṭābhir vimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:66_13: abhijñābhiḥ samādhidhāraṇīmukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:66_14: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir yāvad aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatayā ca.
S06psp_4u:67_0: iyaṃ ca śāriputra prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:67_1: tatra bhikṣur bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:67_2_0: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti te devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ
S06psp_4u:67_2_1: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgamiṣyanti buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā
S06psp_4u:67_2_2: mānayamānāḥ pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāsyanti yad uta śrāvakayānena
S06psp_4u:68_0: seyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā dakṣiṇāpathād vartanyāṃ pracariṣyati.
S06psp_4u:68_1: tatrāpi bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:68_2: 29) vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_4u:68_3: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:68_4: devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:68_5: buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā mānayamānāḥ pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:69_0: sā khalu punar iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vartanyā uttarāpathe pracariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:69_1: tatrāpi śāriputra bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:69_2: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:69_3: te devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:69_4: buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:69_5: anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:70_0: tatra śāriputra iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati tat kasya hetor? na hi śāriputra maṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmāntarddhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:70_1: samanvāhṛtās te śāriputra mayā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca,
S06psp_4u:70_2: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
S06psp_4u:70_3_0: ye 'pi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:70_3_1: likhitvā ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis,
S06psp_4u:70_4_0: te ca khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraś ca tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ
S06psp_4u:70_4_1: gamiṣyanti devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_4u:70_4_2: abhyudgamya buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayanto pūjayanto 'nupūrveṇa
S06psp_4u:70_4_3: tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:70_5: tat kasya hetor? dṛṣṭā hi te śāriputra kulaputrāḥ (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:70_6: 30) kuladuhitaraś ca tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās tathāgatena praśastās te tathāgatena,
S06psp_4u:70_7_0: ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti
S06psp_4u:70_7_1: dhriyante yāpayanti tair api tathāgatair api arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair dṛṣṭās te
S06psp_4u:70_7_2: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās te praśastās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06psp_4u:71_0: śāriputra āha: vaistārikī punar iyaṃ bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:72_0: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_4u:72_1: iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi vaistārikī bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:72_2_0: tatra śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ya imāṃ
S06psp_4u:72_2_1: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:72_2_2: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante.
S06psp_4u:72_3_0: cirayānasaṃprasthitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bahubuddhaparyupāsitās te tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlā
S06psp_4u:72_3_1: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:72_3_2: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante.
S06psp_4u:73_0: śāriputra āha: kiyantas te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti?,
S06psp_4u:73_1_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge śrutvā
S06psp_4u:73_1_1: likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:74_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge bahavo bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:74_1: alpakāḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:74_2: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante.
S06psp_4u:75_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ya
S06psp_4u:75_0_1: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:75_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? anubaddhā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ paripṛcchitāś ca paripraśnīkṛtāś ca.
S06psp_4u:75_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā paripūrṇā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:75_4: dānapāramitāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_5: adhyātmaśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_6: bahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_7: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_8: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:75_9: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahānārddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāṣṭāṅgamārgaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_10: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_11: āryasatyaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_12: aṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_13: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti samādhidhāraṇīmukhaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:75_14: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:75_15: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca kuśalamūlopastabdhāś ca bahujanasya ca te 'tha kariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:76_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy amutra mayā teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kathitā,
S06psp_4u:76_1: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās,
S06psp_4u:76_2: tair api buddhair bhagavadbhis teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kathitā teṣāñ jātivyativṛttānām api ta eva samudācārā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:77_0: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca saṃhatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:77_1: te na śakyante bhettuṃ māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ prāg evānyaiḥ pāpecchaiḥ pāpasamācārair,
S06psp_4u:78_0: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā udārāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ pramodyaṃ pratilapsyante.
S06psp_4u:78_1: te ca bahujanaṃ kuśalamūleṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti yad utānuttarām eva samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya.
S06psp_4u:79_0: evaṃ ca taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca mama saṃmukhaṃ vāg bhāṣitā,

S06psp_4u:137_0: bhagavān āha: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:138_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ bahūni pratibhānāny utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:138_5: tat kasya hetor? apratibhānā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:138_14: tat kasya hetor? na hi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām ime dharmāḥ saṃvidyante.
S06psp_4u:138_15: sacet subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā likhanebhir dharmo vikṣipyate.
S06psp_4u:138_16: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:138_18: subhūtir āha: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā likhitum.
S06psp_4u:139_0: bhagavān āha: no subhūte, tat kasya hetor? na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:139_1: na dhyānapāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:139_2: na sarvaśūnyatānāṃ na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nāryasatyānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:139_3: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nābhijñānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:139_4: na sarvasamādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:139_5: na daśānāṃ balānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:139_8: so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ. seyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na cābhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo likhitum.
S06psp_4u:140_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhāva iti saṃjñāsyanti idam api teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:141_0: subhūtir āha: ye kecid bhagavan mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarair likhitvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā mayā likhiteti maṃsyante,
S06psp_4u:141_1: te 'pi lipiṣv akṣareṣv imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhinivekṣyante,
S06psp_4u:141_2: idam api bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:142_0: subhūtir āha: tat kasya hetor? anakṣarā hi bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,

S06psp_4u:142_2_0: anakṣarā hi śīlapāramitā, anakṣarā hi dānapāramitā, anakṣaraṃ bhagavan rūpaṃ, vedanā
S06psp_4u:142_2_1: saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, anakṣaraṃ bhagavan vijñānam, anakṣarā bhagavan dhātavaḥ, anakṣarāṇi
S06psp_4u:142_6: anakṣarāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ, anakṣarāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ, anakṣarāṇi sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06psp_4u:142_10: anakṣarā abhijñāḥ, anakṣarāṇi tathāgatabalāni, anakṣarāṇi vaiśāradyāni, anakṣarāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ, anakṣarā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_4u:143_0: sacet punar bhagavan mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā anakṣarāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhinivekṣyante,
S06psp_4u:143_5_1: satyāni apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06psp_4u:143_7: idam api bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.

S06psp_4u:147_4_0: tatra subhūte ye 'nupāyakuśalā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ

S06psp_4u:194_3: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhavyāni buddhvā ca vivarjayitavyāni.
S06psp_4u:195_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte adhyātmaśūnyatāpratirūpakāṇi yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpratirūpakāṇi mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:195_2: tāni buddhvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇi vivarjayitavyāni.
S06psp_4u:195_3: evañ ca vakṣyati, etān paryavāpnuhi etān paryavāpya ihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpnuhi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpnuhi,
S06psp_4u:195_4_0: imāny eva tvaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvaya samyakprahāṇāni bhāvaya ṛddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
S06psp_4u:195_6: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām udgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ yāvan manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi upasaṃhariṣyati.
S06psp_4u:196_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:196_1: suvarṇavarṇakāyena vyāmaprabhāṃ kṛtvā tatra bodhisattvas taṃ dṛṣṭvā spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyati,
S06psp_4u:196_3: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
S06psp_4u:196_4: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:197_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca purato buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgham upadarśayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:197_2: aham apy anāgate 'dhvany evaṃrūpas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ syām,
S06psp_4u:197_3: evaṃ ca bhikṣugaṇaṃ parikarṣeyaṃ yathā yaṃ tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati tathaivāham api dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:197_4: sa tatra spṛhām utpādayiṣyati spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyati,
S06psp_4u:197_6: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
S06psp_4u:197_7: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:198_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anekāni bodhisattvaśatāni anekāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi upadarśayati,
S06psp_4u:198_2: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:198_3: te bodhisattvās teṣāṃ māranirmitānām antike spṛhām utpādayiṣyanti spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyanti,
S06psp_4u:198_5: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
S06psp_4u:198_6: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:198_7: tat kasya hetor? na hīha subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:198_8: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_4u:198_9: na vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate, na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:198_10: na pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nāṣṭavimokṣā na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:198_11: na sarvaśūnyatā na sarvasamādhayaḥ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:198_12: na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:198_13: yatra ca subhūte na rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:198_14: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:198_15_0: na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na
S06psp_4u:198_15_1: pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nāṣṭavimokṣā
S06psp_4u:198_15_2: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na sarvaśūnyatā
S06psp_4u:198_16: 55) sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:198_17: yatra na bodhir na tatra buddho na bodhisattvā na śrāvakāḥ saṃvidyante.
S06psp_4u:198_18: tat kasya hetoḥ? svabhāvaśūnyā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_4u:199_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bahvantarāyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:199_1: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ.
S06psp_4u:199_2: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāni jāmbūdvīpakāni ratnāni,
S06psp_4u:199_4_0: evam etat subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:199_4_1: likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ yoniśo
S06psp_4u:199_4_2: manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyāṃ bahavo 'ntarāyā bhaviṣyanti bahavaḥ pratyarthikāḥ.
S06psp_4u:200_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
S06psp_4u:200_3: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:200_5: mandabuddhayo ye 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:200_6: na teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhiḥ prakramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:200_7: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitān na likhiṣyanti likhyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti bhāvyamānāyāñ cāntarāyaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:201_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat mārādhiṣṭhitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06psp_4u:201_0_1: ca bhaviṣyanti navayānasaṃprasthitā anavaropitakuśalamūlāḥ parīttakuśalamūlāḥ na
S06psp_4u:201_1: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:201_2: ye 'ntarāyaṃ kariṣyanti, alpabuddhikās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca mandabuddhikāḥ parīttabuddhikā,
S06psp_4u:201_3: na ca teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ kramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:201_5: 56) likhiṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:201_6: anyeṣāñ ca likhatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:201_7: kiñ cāpi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām imāni mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:201_8: sacet punaḥ subhūte yad imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca likhatāṃ svādhyāyatām uddiśatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatāṃ mārakarmāṇi notpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:201_12_1: balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmān yāvat sarvajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:201_13_0: veditavyam idaṃ subhūte buddhānubhāva eṣa yenaiṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca
S06psp_4u:201_13_1: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ
S06psp_4u:201_15: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān sarvasamādhīn sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvavimokṣamukhāni paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:201_16: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ pañcābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:201_18: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:201_20: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_4u:201_21: te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kṛtaśa udyogam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:201_22: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ,
S06psp_4u:201_23_0: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu avinivartanīyā bodhisattvās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:201_23_1: ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo
S06psp_4u:201_24: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyāḥ kasyāścid eva bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:201_25: pañca vā daśa vā (PSP_4:57) viṃśatir vā triṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā pañcāśad vā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:201_26: te 'syā mātur glānāyāḥ sarve 'py udyogam āpadyeran,
S06psp_4u:201_27: kim ity asmākaṃ mātur antarāyo na bhavet,
S06psp_4u:201_28: kim ity asmākaṃ mātā ciraṃ jīvet,
S06psp_4u:201_29: kim ity asmākaṃ mātuḥ śarīre amanaāpaḥ sparśo na nipated,
S06psp_4u:201_30: eṣāsmākaṃ jananī śarīrasya dātrī jīvitasya dhātrī,
S06psp_4u:201_31: te tāṃ mātaram upasthitām upatiṣṭheran sugopitāṃ gopāyeyur,
S06psp_4u:201_32: mā bhūd asyā jīvitāntarāyo vā śarīradaurbalyaṃ vā daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpopanipāto vā śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādi duṣkhaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:201_33: evan te putrās tasyā mātuḥ sarvasukhopadhānāny upasaṃhareyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:201_34: evan te tāṃ mātaraṃ sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyur mimīyur eṣāsmākam asya lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:201_35: evam eva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06psp_4u:201_36: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_4u:201_37: tat kasya hetor? eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāsmākaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ jananī jñānālokasya kārikā,
S06psp_4u:201_38: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:201_39: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_4u:201_40: tat kasya hetor? eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā jananī tathāgatānām,
S06psp_4u:201_42: tena tathāgatāḥ kṛtajñatām upādāya ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_4u:201_43: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi tathāgatānāṃ dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:201_44: ato nirjātā hi tathāgatānām adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:201_45: ato nirjātāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06psp_4u:201_48: ato nirjātāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo,
S06psp_4u:201_51: ato nirjātāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_4u:201_52: ato nirjātāḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ, ato nirjātā sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:201_57: ye 'pi kecit subhūte (PSP_4:58) tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06psp_4u:201_58: sarve te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ abhisaṃbudhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06psp_4u:201_59_0: ye 'pi te subhūte mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
S06psp_4u:201_59_1: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti
S06psp_4u:201_59_2: yoniśo manasikariṣyanti sarve te tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair buddhacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:201_59_3: satatasamitaṃ samanvāhriyante teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ
S06psp_4u:201_59_4: ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaṃ guptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti
S06psp_4u:201_60: iti jāmbūdvīpakamahāratnodāharaṇādidṛṣṭāntena mahānubhāvatvam ity uktā doṣāḥ
S06psp_4u:202_0: subhūtir āha: yad bhagavān āha, prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī ti.
S06psp_4u:202_1_0: kathaṃ ca bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā janayitrī? kathañ ca bhagavan
S06psp_4u:202_1_1: prajñāpāramitāsya lokasya darśayitrī? kathañ ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato
S06psp_4u:203_0: bhagavān āha: anayā subhūte gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā daśatathāgatabalāni janitāni,
S06psp_4u:203_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā mahāmaitrī mahāmuditā mahopekṣā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvat sarvākārajñatā janitā,
S06psp_4u:203_2: ebhiś ca subhūte dharmais tathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06psp_4u:203_3: tasmāt tarhi subhūte anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato janitaḥ.
S06psp_4u:204_0: subhūtir āha: katamaḥ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena loka ity ākhyātaḥ?
S06psp_4u:205_0: bhagavān āha: pañca subhūte skandhās tathāgatena loka ākhyātaḥ.
S06psp_4u:206_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ?
S06psp_4u:207_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā imān pañca skandhān lujyamānān darśayati,
S06psp_4u:207_1: na pralujyamānān darśayati, notpadyamānān (PSP_4:59) darśayati, na nirūdhyamānān darśayati, na saṃkliśyamānān na vyavadāyamānān darśayati,
S06psp_4u:207_3: nāyūhaṃ na niryūhaṃ nātītān nānāgatān na pratyutpannān dharmān darśayati.
S06psp_4u:207_4: tat kasya hetor? na hi śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā,
S06psp_4u:207_7: nānabhisaṃskaro nānutpādo na nirodho nābhāvo nāsvabhāvo lujyate vā pralujyate vā.
S06psp_4u:207_8: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatena gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā lokasya darśayitrī ākhyātā.
S06psp_4u:208_0: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajānanti,
S06psp_4u:208_1: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ paracittavidas te 'pi prajñāpāramitām āgamya prajānanti.
S06psp_4u:208_2: na punaḥ subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sattvo na sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:208_4: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_4u:208_6: na cakṣūrūpaṃ na cakṣurvijñānaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:208_11_0: evaṃ na śrotraṃ na śabdo na ghrāṇaṃ na gandho na jihvā na raso na kāyo na spraṣṭavyaṃ
S06psp_4u:208_11_1: na mano na dharmo na manovijñānaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāprajñaptir

S06psp_4u:227_10: yā ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ tathatā sā sarvasamādhīnāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_11: yā sarvasamādhīnāṃ tathatā sā sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_12: yā sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ tathatā sā daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_13: yā daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ tathatā sā caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_14: yā caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ tathatā sā catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_15: yā catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ tathatā sā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyās tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_16: yā mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyās tathatā sāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_17: yāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā sā sarvajñatāyās tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_18: yā sarvajñatāyās tathatā sā kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_19: yā kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā sā laukikalokottarāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ sāvadyānavadyānāṃ sakleśaniḥkleśāṇāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānānāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_20: yā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā sātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_29: yā arhattvaphalatathatā sā pratyekabuddhatathatā yā pratyekabuddhatathatā sā pratyekabodhitathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_34: iti hi yā ca tathāgatatathatā yā ca sarvasattvatathatā,
S06psp_4u:227_40: evam iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathatā tathāgatānāṃ janayitrī,
S06psp_4u:227_41: evaṃ hi subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā lokasya darśayitrī,
S06psp_4u:227_42: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmatathatāṃ jānāti,
S06psp_4u:227_44: yayā tathatayā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_4u:228_0: subhūtir āha: gambhīrā bhagavan yad uta sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā.
S06psp_4u:228_1: anayā bhagavaṃs tathatayā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ prakāśikā.
S06psp_4u:228_2_0: ko 'tra bhagavann adhimokṣyate? anyatrāvinivartanīyair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair
S06psp_4u:228_2_1: dṛṣṭisaṃpannair vā pudgalair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair vā yāvad gambhīrā bhagavann ime
S06psp_4u:229_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte akṣayā tathatā.
S06psp_4u:229_1: kasmād akṣayā? sarvadharmāṇām akṣayatvād akṣayā tathatā,
S06psp_4u:229_2: eṣā sā subhūte tathatā tathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyākhyātā yad uta sarvadharmatathatā.
S06psp_4u:230_0_0: atha khalu yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrās
S06psp_4u:230_0_1: te sarve divyāni candanacūrṇāni parigṛhya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya
S06psp_4u:230_1: ekānte sthitāś ca te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:231_0: bhagavān āha: śūnyatālakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:231_1: ānimittalakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:231_2: apraṇihitalakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_4u:233_0_1: asvabhāvalakṣaṇā aniśritalakṣaṇā ākāśalakṣaṇā aśāśvatalakṣaṇā anucchedalakṣaṇā anabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇā
S06psp_4u:233_0_2: anekārthalakṣaṇā anānārthalakṣaṇā anāgamanalakṣaṇā āgamanalakṣaṇā alakṣaṇā hi devaputrā
S06psp_4u:233_1: evaṃlakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:233_2: tathāgatena lokasaṃketena vyavahriyate na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_4u:234_0: na hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena śakyante vikopayitum.
S06psp_4u:234_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? sadevamānuṣāsuro 'pi hi lokas tallakṣaṇa,
S06psp_4u:234_2: evaṃ na hi devaputrā lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vikopayati,
S06psp_4u:234_5: iti hi lakṣaṇāni ca alakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaṇālakṣaṇāni ca,
S06psp_4u:235_0: na hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni rūpasaṃskṛtāni,
S06psp_4u:235_1_0: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā, na vijñānasaṃskṛtāni na dhātusaṃskṛtāni nāyatanasaṃskṛtāni
S06psp_4u:235_1_1: na pratītyasamutpādasaṃskṛtāni na dānapāramitāsaṃskṛtāni na śīlapāramitāsaṃskṛtāni
S06psp_4u:235_1_2: na kṣāntipāramitāsaṃskṛtāni na vīryapāramitāsaṃskṛtāni dhyānapāramitāsaṃskṛtāni prajñāpāramitāsaṃskṛtāni
S06psp_4u:235_2_0: nābhijñāsaṃskṛtāni na sarvasamādhisaṃskṛtāni na sarvadhāraṇīmukhasaṃskṛtāni na tathāgatabalasaṃskṛtāni
S06psp_4u:236_0: na hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni manuṣyāṇāṃ vā amanuṣyāṇāṃ vā sāsravāṇi vā anāsravāṇi vā laukikāni vā lokottarāṇi vā saṃskṛtāni vā asaṃskṛtāni vā.
S06psp_4u:237_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān etad (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:237_1: 69) avocat: yadi kaścid devaputrā ākāśaṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam? iti vaded,
S06psp_4u:237_2: api nu sa samyag vadamāno vadet.
S06psp_4u:238_0: devaputrā āhur: na bhagavan samyag vadamāno vadet.
S06psp_4u:238_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavann ākāśaṃ kenacil lakṣaṇena saṃvidyate asaṃskṛtatvād ākāśadhātoḥ.
S06psp_4u:239_0: bhagavān āha: utpādād vā devaputrās tathāgatānām anutpādād vā sthitaivaiṣā dharmadhātusthitir evaṃlakṣaṇā,
S06psp_4u:239_1: yathā sthito lakṣaṇahetuḥ sā bhūtā tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_4u:240_0: devaputrā āhuḥ: gambhīrāṇi bhagavann imāni lakṣaṇāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāni yeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānām abhisaṃbuddhatvāt,
S06psp_4u:240_1: tathāgatasyāsaṅgajñānaṃ yeṣu lakṣaṇeṣu sthitvā tathāgatena sarvalakṣaṇāni saṃprakāśitāni,
S06psp_4u:240_3: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad gambhīreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ gocaro,
S06psp_4u:240_4: yatra carato tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_4u:240_5: anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvalakṣaṇānāṃ prabhedaḥ kṛto,
S06psp_4u:240_7: evaṃ skandhalakṣaṇasya dhātulakṣaṇasya āyatanalakṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇasya prabhedaḥ kṛto yāvat sarvajñatālakṣaṇasya prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ.
S06psp_4u:241_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:241_6: rāśīlakṣaṇā skandhāḥ, gotralakṣaṇā dhātavaḥ, āyadvāralakṣaṇāny āyatanāni, sāmagrīlakṣaṇaḥ pratītyasamutpādas tathāgatenaite 'lakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06psp_4u:241_14: avikopanalakṣaṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayas (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:241_16: nairyāṇikalakṣaṇāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmās te tathāgatenālakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06psp_4u:241_17_0: viviktalakṣaṇā śūnyatā, śāntalakṣaṇam ānimittam, anābhogalakṣaṇam apraṇihitaṃ tat
S06psp_4u:241_17_1: tathāgatenālakṣaṇam ity abhisaṃbuddhaṃ vimocalakṣaṇā vimokṣyās te tathāgatenālakṣaṇā
S06psp_4u:241_23: asaṃhāryalakṣaṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmās te tathāgatenālakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhā yāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ tathāgatenālakṣaṇam ity abhisaṃbuddham.
S06psp_4u:241_24: evaṃ hi devaputrās tathāgatena sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhās tena tathāgato saṅgajñānīty ucyate.
S06psp_4u:242_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_4u:242_1: prajñāpāramitā subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya yenaiva janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī tena kāraṇena tathāgata imaṃ prajñāpāramitādharmam upaniśritya viharati.
S06psp_4u:243_0: evaṃ dharmaṃ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati arcayaty apacāyate.
S06psp_4u:243_1: iyaṃ sā subhūte prajñāpāramitādharmatā tasmād imāṃ tathāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayaty arcayaty apacāyate.
S06psp_4u:243_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_4u:243_4: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte samyagvadamānā vadeyuḥ kṛtajñaḥ kṛtavedīti tathāgataṃ,
S06psp_4u:243_5: te samyagvadamānāḥ samyag vadeyuḥ kṛtajñaḥ kṛtavedīti.
S06psp_4u:243_6: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ kṛtajño bhavati kṛtavedīti? yena subhūte yānena tathāgata āgataḥ,
S06psp_4u:243_7_0: yayā pratipadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhas tatas tathāgatas tad eva
S06psp_4u:243_7_1: yānaṃ tām eva pratipadaṃ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati arcayaty apacāyate
S06psp_4u:243_8: iyaṃ sā subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_4u:244_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā akṛtā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ kārakāsattām upādāya,
S06psp_4u:244_1: avikṛtā ity abhisaṃbuddhā nigrahāsattām upādāya iyam api subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_4u:244_2: evaṃ tathāgatena prajñāpāramitām āgamya sarvadharmā akṛtā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06psp_4u:245_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya prajñāpāramitām āgamya sarvadharmeṣv akṛtakajñānaṃ
S06psp_4u:245_0_1: pravṛttam apravṛttisaṃketenānena subhūte paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī
S06psp_4u:246_0: subhūtir āha: yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
S06psp_4u:246_1: kathaṃ tadā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī?
S06psp_4u:247_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
S06psp_4u:247_1: kathañ ca subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ? sarvadharmā hi subhūte śūnyāḥ ṛktakāḥ tucchakā asārakāḥ,
S06psp_4u:247_2: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ.
S06psp_4u:248_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
S06psp_4u:248_1: kathañ ca subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ? sarvadharmāḥ subhūte aniśritā aparyāpannāḥ,
S06psp_4u:248_2: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ.
S06psp_4u:248_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:248_9: evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:249_0_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyādṛṣṭatvāt? kathaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ?
S06psp_4u:249_0_1: kathaṃ vijñānasyādṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī bhavati? kathaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasyādṛṣṭatvād
S06psp_4u:249_0_2: darśayitrī? kathaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā adṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī?
S06psp_4u:250_0: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte na rūpārambaṇaṃ vijñanam utpadyate,
S06psp_4u:250_9_0: evaṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
S06psp_4u:250_12: yadā subhūte na sarvajñatārambaṇaṃ vijñānam utpadyate,
S06psp_4u:250_14: evaṃ hi subhūte iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:251_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī? iha subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati.
S06psp_4u:251_1: kim iti lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati? pañcaskandhā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
S06psp_4u:251_4: daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
S06psp_4u:251_5: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
S06psp_4u:251_6: avidyā pratyayo dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādo lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
S06psp_4u:251_7: satkāyadṛṣṭipūrvakāni dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭikṛtāni lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
S06psp_4u:251_8: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
S06psp_4u:251_10: evam adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati.
S06psp_4u:251_11: evaṃ daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
S06psp_4u:251_13: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:252_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaḥ śūnya iti jñāpayati.
S06psp_4u:252_1: (PSP_4:73) kim iti lokaḥ śūnya iti jñāpayati? skandhadhātvāyatanāni lokaḥ śūnya iti jñāpayati,
S06psp_4u:252_2: pratītyasamutpādo daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo lokaḥ śūnya iti jñāpayati,
S06psp_4u:252_3: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā yāvat sarvajñatā lokaḥ śūnya iti jñapayati.
S06psp_4u:252_4: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitri asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:253_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya lokaḥ śūnya iti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:253_1_0: kim iti lokaḥ śūnya iti darśayati? skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ daśakuśalāḥ
S06psp_4u:253_1_1: karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭipūrvakāṇi
S06psp_4u:253_1_3: yāvat sarvākārajñatā lokaḥ śūnya iti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:253_2: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:254_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya loko 'cintya iti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:254_1: kim iti loko 'cintya iti darśayati? pañcaskandhā dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādo yāvat sarvākārajñatā loko 'cintya iti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:254_2: evaṃ vivikta iti atyantaśūnya iti svabhāvaśūnya iti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:255_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya lokaḥ śānta iti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:255_1: kim iti lokaḥ śānta iti darśayati? skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā yāvat sarvākārajñatā lokaḥ śānta iti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:255_2: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:256_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:256_1: kim iti lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati? pañcaskandhā lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati,
S06psp_4u:256_4: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati.
S06psp_4u:256_5: evaṃ hi subhūte (PSP_4:74) prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
S06psp_4u:256_6: sā punar iyaṃ subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasyaivaṃ lokaṃ darśayati,
S06psp_4u:256_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye nehalokasaṃjñāṃ paralokasaṃjñāṃ vā kuryād.
S06psp_4u:257_0: subhūtir āha: mahākṛtyena bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā bhagavataḥ pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_4u:258_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, mahākṛtyena subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā tathāgatānāṃ.
S06psp_4u:258_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte mahākṛtyena prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? mahākṛtyam idaṃ subhūte tathāgatānāṃ yad uta sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇalayanāparityāgārthena.
S06psp_4u:258_2: kathaṃ ca subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? acintyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam.
S06psp_4u:258_3: evam acintyakṛtyena subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām.
S06psp_4u:258_4: kathaṃ ca subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? na hi subhūte kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:258_5: yaḥ śaknuyāt tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ tulayitum.
S06psp_4u:258_6: anena subhūte paryāyeṇātulyakṛtyena tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_4u:258_7_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_4u:258_7_1: pratyupasthitā? aprameyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ
S06psp_4u:258_8: anena subhūte paryāyeṇāprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_4u:258_9_0: kathañ ca subhūte tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām asaṃkhyeyakṛtyena prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_4u:258_9_1: pratyupasthitā? asaṃkhyeyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ
S06psp_4u:258_12: kathañ ca subhūte asamasamakṛtyena prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? nāsti subhūte tathāgatānāṃ samaḥ kutaḥ punar uttaraḥ.
S06psp_4u:258_13: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa asamasamakṛtyena tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_4u:259_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam?
S06psp_4u:260_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, acintyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam,
S06psp_4u:260_1: evam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam.
S06psp_4u:260_2: rūpam api subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamaṃ,
S06psp_4u:260_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam,
S06psp_4u:260_7: yā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra cittan na caitasikā vā dharmā upalapsyante.
S06psp_4u:260_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman na prajñāyate,
S06psp_4u:260_9: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ hi subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman na prajñāyate.
S06psp_4u:261_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan rūpam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman na prajñāyate,
S06psp_4u:261_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman na prajñāyate.
S06psp_4u:261_3: evaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāpi bhagavan kena kāraṇena 'cintyā 'tulyā 'prameyā 'saṃkhyeyā 'samasamā na prajñāyate?
S06psp_4u:262_0: bhagavān āha: rūpasyāpi cintanaṃ tulanaṃ pramāṇaṃ gaṇanaṃ samaviṣamatvaṃ na prajñayate.
S06psp_4u:262_1: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāś cintanaṃ tulanaṃ pramāṇaṃ gaṇanaṃ samaviṣamatvaṃ na prajñāyate.
S06psp_4u:263_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan rūpasya yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāś (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:263_1: 76) cintanaṃ tulanaṃ pramāṇaṃ gaṇanaṃ samaviṣamatvaṃ na prajñāyate?
S06psp_4u:264_0: bhagavān āha: rūpasya subhūte svabhāvo 'cintyo 'tulyo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo 'samasamo niḥsvabhāvatvāt,
S06psp_4u:264_5: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yad rūpam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam api nu tatra rūpam upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:264_6: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, yat subhūte vijñānam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam api nu tatra vijñānam upalabhyate.
S06psp_4u:264_7: ye dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ,
S06psp_4u:264_9: yā subhūte sarvajñatā 'cintyā 'tulyā 'prameyā 'saṃkhyeyā 'samasamā 'pi nu tatra sarvajñatopalabhyate.
S06psp_4u:266_0: bhagavān āha: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ,
S06psp_4u:266_1: ime te subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyāś cintanoparatatvād,
S06psp_4u:266_2: atulyās tulanoparatatvād, aprameyāḥ pramāṇoparatatvād, asaṃkhyeyā gaṇanoparatatvād, asamasamāḥ samaviṣamoparatatvāt.
S06psp_4u:266_3: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ,
S06psp_4u:266_4: ime te subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyāś cintāsamatikrāntāḥ,
S06psp_4u:266_13: ime te subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ.
S06psp_4u:266_15: evam atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā ākāśāsamasamatvād.
S06psp_4u:266_16: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:266_17: 77) asamasamāḥ, te na śakyante sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sarvadevakenāpi lokena cintayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā pramātuṃ vā saṃkhyātuṃ vā samaviṣamaṃ vā kartum.
S06psp_4u:266_19: asmin khalu punar acintyātulyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsamasamaparivartadharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
S06psp_4u:266_20: viṃśatīnāṃ ca bhikṣuṇī śatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
S06psp_4u:266_21: ṣaṣṭeś copāsakasahasrāṇāṃ viṃśatīnām upāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddhaṃ,
S06psp_4u:266_22: viṃśateś ca bodhisattvasahasrāṇām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt.
S06psp_4u:266_23: te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā buddhā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:267_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:268_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:268_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat, mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_4u:268_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pañcapāramitāḥ samāyuktāḥ.
S06psp_4u:268_4: atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām adhyātmaśūnyatā samāyuktā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā samāyuktā,
S06psp_4u:268_5: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ samāyuktaḥ.
S06psp_4u:268_6_0: atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni
S06psp_4u:268_6_1: catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāry āryasatyāni aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_4u:268_7: atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ daśatathāgatabalāni samāyuktāni,
S06psp_4u:268_8: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ samāyuktāḥ.
S06psp_4u:268_9: atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ buddhabhūmiḥ samāyuktā yāvat sarvākārajñatā samāyuktā,
S06psp_4u:268_10: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:268_11: 78) yāni tāni rājakṛtyāni bhavanti sarvāṇi tāny amātyasamāyuktāny alpotsukas tato rājā bhavaty apahṛtabhāraḥ rājakṛtye vā janapadakṛtye vā.
S06psp_4u:268_12: evam eva subhūte ye kecic chrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāsamāyuktāḥ prajñāpāramitā teṣāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti.
S06psp_4u:268_13: tasmāt tarhi subhūte mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_4u:268_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā rūpasyāparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_4u:269_0_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyāparigrahāyānabhiniveśāyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
S06psp_4u:269_0_1: kathaṃ bhagavan vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ? kathaṃ bhagavan vijñānasyāparigrahāyānabhiniveśāyeyaṃ
S06psp_4u:269_0_2: prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? yāvat kathaṃ bhagavann anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher
S06psp_4u:270_0: bhagavān āha: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tad rūpaṃ yad rūpaṃ yena vā parigṛhṇīyād abhiniveśeta vā?
S06psp_4u:271_0: subhūtir āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ.
S06psp_4u:272_0_0: bhagavān āha: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tad vijñānaṃ yena vā parigṛhṇīyād abhiniveśeta?
S06psp_4u:272_0_1: evaṃ yāvat samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yā parigṛhṇīyād
S06psp_4u:273_1: bhagavān āha: sādhu sādhu subhūte, aham api subhūte tad rūpan na samanupaśyāmi yat parigṛhṇīyāṃ vā abhiniviśeyaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:273_3: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān, aham api subhūte tad vijñānan na samanupaśyāmi yat parigṛhṇīyāṃ vā abhiniviśeyaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:273_5: evaṃ yāvad aham api subhūte tām (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:273_8: aham api subhūte buddhabhūmiṃ sarvajñatāṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_4u:273_10: aparigṛhṇan nābhiniviśe, tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair rūpan na parigrahītavyaṃ nābhiniveṣṭavyam.
S06psp_4u:273_12: vijñānaṃ subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na parigrahītavyan nābhiniveṣṭavyam.
S06psp_4u:273_14: evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_4u:273_15_1: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_4u:273_15_2: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na parigrahītavyā nābhiniveṣṭavyā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
S06psp_4u:273_16: evaṃ buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvākārajñatvaṃ tathāgatatvan na parigrahītavyaṃ nābhiniveṣṭavyam.
S06psp_4u:274_0: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:274_1: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhā atarkā atarkāvacarā śāntā sūkṣmā nipunapaṇḍitavijñavedaniyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_4u:274_2: te khalu bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:274_5: te khalu bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:275_0: saced bhagavan ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvāḥ sarve te śraddhānusāriṇo bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:275_2: pratyekabuddhā bhaveyuḥ, (PSP_4:80) teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yac ca jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:275_3: yā ceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām ekadevasikī kṣāntiruciś cintanā tulanā upaparīkṣaṇā gaṇanā iyam eva tataḥ paraṃ śreyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:275_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca śraddhānusāriṇo dharmānusāriṇo 'ṣṭamakasya srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca,
S06psp_4u:276_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_4u:276_2: yac ca yāvat pratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:277_0: yaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S06psp_4u:277_1: śrutvā ca likheta likhitvā ca uddiśyed yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt.
S06psp_4u:277_2: eṣāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca kṣiprataraṃ parinirvāṇaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:277_3: na tv eva teṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāvirahitānām anyeṣu sūtrānteṣu caratām.
S06psp_4u:277_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sāmutkarṣikā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śraddhānusāribhir dharmānusāribhir aṣṭamakaiś ca śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:277_5: yatra ca srotaāpannaiḥ sakṛdāgāmibhir anāgāmibhir arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhair mahāyānasaṃprasthitair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiś ca śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:277_6: yathā tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ śikṣamāṇair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā.
S06psp_4u:278_0: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā udānam udānayāmāsuh:
S06psp_4u:278_3: yatra hi nāma bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā śraddhānusāriṇo niryāsyanti dharmānusāriṇo niryāsyanti aṣṭamakāḥ,
S06psp_4u:278_6: yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_4u:278_7: na cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate.
S06psp_4u:279_0: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā abhūvan.
S06psp_4u:279_2: ye kāmāvacarā devaputrās te kāmadhātau prātiṣṭhante,
S06psp_4u:279_3: ye rūpāvacarā devaputrās te rūpadhātau prātiṣṭhante.
S06psp_4u:280_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:280_1: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate sa kutaś cyuta ihopapanno bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_4u:281_0_0: bhagavān āha: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā
S06psp_4u:281_0_1: saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyati na saṃleṣyati na dhanvāyiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati
S06psp_4u:281_0_2: na vicikitsiṣyati abhinandiṣyati cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotuṃ śrutvā cemāṃ
S06psp_4u:281_1: na tān manasikārān gacchann āgacchan sthito niṣaṇnaḥ śāyito vā satatasamitam ucchrakṣyati,
S06psp_4u:281_2: taṃ ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalaṃ satatasamitam anubandhiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:281_3: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaur notsṛjati vatsam.
S06psp_4u:281_4_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśas
S06psp_4u:281_4_1: tāvan na jahāti taṃ dharmabhāṇakaṃ yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kāyagatā kṛtā bhaviṣyati
S06psp_4u:281_4_2: dhṛtāvācitā paricitā manasā ca prekṣitā dṛṣṭvā supratividdhā,
S06psp_4u:281_5: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo navayānikapudgalo manuṣyeṣv eva cyuto manuṣyeṣv evopapannaḥ.
S06psp_4u:281_6_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena navayānikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvam apīyaṃ
S06psp_4u:281_6_1: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā likhitvā pustakagatā satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitā arcitā
S06psp_4u:281_6_3: ca dīpamālābhiḥ sa tena kuśalamūlena manuṣyeṣv eva cyuto manuṣyeṣv evopapannaḥ,
S06psp_4u:282_0_0: subhūtir āha: syād bhagavan paryāyo yad etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:282_0_1: mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya tataś cyutaḥ
S06psp_4u:282_0_2: sann ihopapanno ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate 'dhimucya
S06psp_4u:282_0_3: likhiṣyati likhitvodgṛhīṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_4u:283_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, syāt subhūte paryāyo yad etair eva guṇaiḥ
S06psp_4u:283_0_1: samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ
S06psp_4u:283_0_2: paryupāsya tataś cyutaḥ sann ihopapanno ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate
S06psp_4u:283_0_3: adhimucya likhiṣyati likhitvodgrahīṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_4u:283_1_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_4u:283_1_1: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutā śrutvā codgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā svādhyāyitā
S06psp_4u:283_2: sa tenaiva kuśalamūlena tair eva manasikārair ihopapannaḥ.
S06psp_4u:284_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tuṣitebhyo devebhyaś cyutaḥ,
S06psp_4u:284_1: iha manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannaḥ sa etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:284_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ sa tena kuśalamūlena ihopapannaḥ.
S06psp_4u:284_3: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na śrutā,
S06psp_4u:284_4: śrutvā ca na paripraśnīkṛtā, tasya manuṣyaloke upapannasya bhavati kāṅkṣayitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā,
S06psp_4u:284_5: tena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pīyaṅ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na śrutā,
S06psp_4u:284_6: śrutvā ca na paripraśnīkṛtā, tasyāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣayitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā,
S06psp_4u:285_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato (PSP_4:

S06psp_4u:286_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi,
S06psp_4u:286_1: adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na śrutā na paripraśnīkṛtā bhavati,
S06psp_4u:286_2: tasyemāṅ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣayitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
S06psp_4u:287_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni na paripraśnīkṛtāni bhavanti na śrutāni vā,
S06psp_4u:287_1: tasyemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāsyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
S06psp_4u:288_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi catvāri śamyakprahāṇāni
S06psp_4u:288_0_1: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo
S06psp_4u:288_2: tasyāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāsyamāṇāyāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
S06psp_4u:288_3_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi catvāri dhyānāni
S06psp_4u:288_3_1: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāry āryasatyāni pañcābhijñāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni,
S06psp_4u:288_4_0: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni daśa bodhisattvabhūmayo
S06psp_4u:288_4_1: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_4u:288_6: tasyemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
S06psp_4u:289_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir na śrutā bhavati,
S06psp_4u:289_2: tasyemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
S06psp_4u:290_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pīyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na śrutā bhavati na paripraśnīkṛtā (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:290_1: 84) na bhāvitā na bahulīkṛtā na yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā,
S06psp_4u:290_2: ekaṃ vā divasaṃ divasadvayaṃ vā divasatrayaṃ vā catvāri vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā daśa vā divasāni,
S06psp_4u:290_3: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sa saṃhāryā bhavati virahitaś ca bhavati prajñāpāramitayā.
S06psp_4u:290_4_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? evam etad bhavati subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā
S06psp_4u:290_4_1: prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato 'pi na śrutā na paripraśnīkṛtā na bhāvitā na bahulīkṛtā
S06psp_4u:290_5: tasya kañcit kālaṃ cchando bhavati gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kañcit kālaṃ cchando na bhavati,
S06psp_4u:290_6: sa punar evaṃ saṃhriyate calācalayā buddhyā tūlapicūpamaś ca bhavati.
S06psp_4u:290_7: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cirayānasaṃprasthito veditavyo na kalyāṇamitraparigṛhīto na samyaksaṃbuddhaparyupāsitaḥ.
S06psp_4u:290_8: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā uddiṣṭā na svādhyāyitā na yoniśo manasikṛtā na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:290_9: na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ.
S06psp_4u:290_12: na samyakprahāṇeṣu narddhipādeṣu nendriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṅgeṣu nāryāṣṭāṅgamārge śikṣitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:290_13: na pañcasv abhijñāsu nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu nāryasatyeṣu nāṣṭavimokṣeṣu śikṣitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:290_16: na ṣaṭsu abhijñāsu śikṣitaḥ, na tathāgatabaleṣu śikṣitaḥ, na vaiśāradyeṣu na pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:290_18: te na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā navayānasaṃprasthitā veditavyāḥ,
S06psp_4u:290_19: te dharmamātrakeṇa ca śraddhāmātrakeṇa ca premamātrakeṇa ca samanvāgatā,
S06psp_4u:290_20_0: na punaḥ satkurvantīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā uddeṣṭuṃ vā svādhyāyatuṃ
S06psp_4u:290_20_1: vā yoniśo manasikaraṇāya yāvan na punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S06psp_4u:290_21: 85) noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti nāpy anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā param anugrahīṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:290_22: evaṃ dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā dānapāramitayā,
S06psp_4u:290_25: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ,
S06psp_4u:290_27: teṣāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhūmibhyām anyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_4u:290_28: yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā.
S06psp_4u:290_29_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_4u:290_29_1: pūrvāntato 'pi na likhitā noddiṣṭā na svādhyātā na yoniśo manasikṛtā nāpy anayā prajñāpāramitayā
S06psp_4u:290_29_2: kaścid anuparigṛhīto nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitānubhūtā,
S06psp_4u:290_30: te na teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca bhūmidvayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam.
S06psp_4u:291_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sāmudrikā naur yadā bhinnā bhavati tadā ye tatra puruṣāḥ kāṣṭhaṃ vā dṛtiṃ vā mṛtakuṇapaṃ vā nādhyālambante na parigṛhṇanti,
S06psp_4u:291_1: veditavyam etat subhūte aprāptā eva te puruṣāḥ kulaṃ samudre kālaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:291_2: ye khalu punaḥ sāmudrikāyāṃ nāvibhinnāyāṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vā dṛtiṃ vā mṛtakuṇapaṃ vā puruṣā gṛhītavyaṃ vā manyeyur gṛhṇīyur vā,
S06psp_4u:291_3: veditavyam etat subhūte na te puruṣā mahāsamudre kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:291_5: te akṣatā anupahatāḥ svastinā sthale sthāsyanti.
S06psp_4u:291_6: evam eva subhūte ye te bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa premamātrakeṇa ca samanvāgatā,
S06psp_4u:291_7: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti nādhyālambiṣyante,
S06psp_4u:291_8: veditavyam etat subhūte te bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāntarā evādhvani vyavasādam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:291_9: aprāptā eva sarvākārajñatāṃ te śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:291_10: yāvan na dhyānapāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na dānapāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:291_11: (PSP_4:86) nādhyālambiṣyanti. evaṃ na saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyān dharmān na catvāry āryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
S06psp_4u:291_12_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nāṣṭa vimokṣān na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr
S06psp_4u:291_12_1: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na sarvasamādhisamāpattīr na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_4u:291_12_2: na daśa balāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikān buddhadharmān yāvan na sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktān
S06psp_4u:291_12_3: sūtrāntān likhiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti nādhyālambiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:291_13: veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāntarāpy adhvani vyavasādam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:291_14: aprāptā eva sarvākārajñatāṃ te śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:291_15_0: yeṣāṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām asti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti
S06psp_4u:291_15_1: premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo
S06psp_4u:291_16: te ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti adhyālambiṣyante yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:291_17: paśya subhūte kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śraddhāṃ kṣāntiṃ prema prasādam adhyāśayaṃ rucim adhimuktiṃ cchandaṃ tyāgam anikṣiptadhuratām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:291_18: yaiḥ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā parigṛhītā,
S06psp_4u:291_19: yair adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇāni dhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_4u:291_20: yair aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni parigṛhītāni,
S06psp_4u:291_21: yair daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvida āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_4u:291_23: yair yāvat sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā te nāntarāpy adhvani vyavasādam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:291_24: te 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmiñ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca sattvāṃś ca paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_4u:292_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭena (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:292_2: veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ ghaṭaś ciram anuvartsyate kṣipram eva vinakṣyati vilayam āpatsyate.

S06psp_4u:292_5_0: evam eva subhūte kiñ cāpi bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsti śraddhāsti
S06psp_4u:292_5_1: kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando
S06psp_4u:292_7: upāyakauśalena cāparigṛhītā, dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā dānapāramitayāparigṛhītā,
S06psp_4u:292_10: samyakprahāṇair aparigṛhītā, ṛddhipādair aparigṛhītāḥ, indriyair aparigṛhītā, balair aparigṛhītā, bodhyaṅgair aparigṛhītā, āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇāparigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_4u:292_18: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair aparigṛhītāḥ,
S06psp_4u:292_20: veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā antarā vyasanam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:292_21: kim iti subhūte bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntarā vyasanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:292_22_0: yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā? tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā
S06psp_4u:292_22_1: puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahen nadyāḥ kūpād vā sarasto vā taḍāgād
S06psp_4u:292_23: veditavyam etat subhūte svastināyaṃ ghaṭo gṛhaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:292_24_0: evam eva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti

S06psp_4u:300_0: bhagavān āha: sādhu sādhu subhūte yas tvaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etam arthaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase,
S06psp_4u:300_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādita eva yad dānan dadāti tad ahaṃkāramamakārapatitayā saṃtatyā dadāti,

S06psp_4u:300_14_1: prajñāpāramitayāparigṛhīto yāvat sarvākārajñatayāparigṛhītaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau
S06psp_4u:300_16: kathañ ca bodhisattvo 'nupāyakuśalo bhavati? iha subhūte yo bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ādāv evam anupāyena dānaṃ dadāti,

S06psp_4u:301_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:301_1_0: kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ?
S06psp_4u:301_1_1: kathaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ
S06psp_4u:301_1_2: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam? kathaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:302_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:
