S06psp_4u:302_8: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_9: mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārato mā vijñānataḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_10: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin dānapāramitayā parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_11: mā śīlapāramitayā mā kṣāntipāramitayā mā vīryapāramitayā mā dhyānapāramitayā,
S06psp_4u:302_13: mā adhyātmaśūnyatayā mā bahirdhāśūnyatayā mā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_18: mā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ mā āryasatyair mā aṣṭābhir vimokṣair mā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_20: mā samādhibhir mā dhāraṇīmukhair mā daśabhis tathāgatabalair mā caturbhir vaiṣāradyair mā catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir mā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_21: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ parāmrākṣīḥ.
S06psp_4u:302_22: tat kasya hetoḥ? aparāmṛṣṭaṃ hi rūpam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_4u:302_25: aparāmṛṣṭā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:302_26: aparāmṛṣṭā prajñāpāramitā, aparāmṛṣṭā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:302_30: aparāmṛṣṭāny āryasatyāni, aparāmṛṣṭā aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_34: aparāmṛṣṭā yāvat sarvākārajñatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_4u:302_35: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ.
S06psp_4u:302_36: tat kasya hetoḥ? aspṛhaṃ hi kulaputra rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:302_38: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra vijñāne spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ.
S06psp_4u:302_39: tat kasya hetoḥ? aspṛhaṃ hi kulaputra vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_4u:302_40: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_49: mā aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_52: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra sarvākārajñatāyāṃ spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ.
S06psp_4u:302_53: tat kasya hetoḥ? aspṛhā hi kulaputra sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:302_54: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra srotaāpattiphale spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_55: mā sakṛdāgāmiphale mā anāgāmiphale mā arhattve mā pratyekabodhau spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
S06psp_4u:302_58: tat kasya hetoḥ? svabhāvaśūnyā hi kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_4u:302_59: ity anāsvādanāviśeṣeṇa mārge caturthaḥ kṣaṇaḥ iti viśeṣalakṣaṇam
S06psp_4u:303_0: subhūtir āha: duṣkarakārakā hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
S06psp_4u:303_1: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ.
S06psp_4u:304_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā,
S06psp_4u:304_1: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:304_2: 96) lokasya hitāya, subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā lokasya sukhāya,
S06psp_4u:304_3: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā lokasya trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāma ity anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06psp_4u:304_4_0: lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmo, lokasya layanaṃ lokasya parāyaṇaṃ lokasya dvīpā lokasya
S06psp_4u:304_4_1: pariṇāyakā anukampakā nāthā lokasya gatir bhaviṣyāma iti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_4u:304_5_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ lokasya hitāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti? iha
S06psp_4u:304_5_1: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvān pañcabhyo gatibhyaḥ parimocyābhayasthale
S06psp_4u:304_6: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā lokasya hitāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti.
S06psp_4u:305_0_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā lokasya sukhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti? iha
S06psp_4u:305_0_1: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān
S06psp_4u:305_1: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā lokānāṃ sukhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti.
S06psp_4u:306_0_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā
S06psp_4u:306_0_1: lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:306_0_2: abhisaṃbudhya yāni tāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni tataḥ sattvāṃs trāyanti,
S06psp_4u:306_1: teṣāñ ca duṣkhānāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06psp_4u:306_2: te taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti.
S06psp_4u:306_3: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti.
S06psp_4u:307_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā
S06psp_4u:307_0_1: lokasya śaranaṃ bhavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:307_1: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti.
S06psp_4u:308_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhavanti? iha subhūte
S06psp_4u:308_0_1: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇām
S06psp_4u:308_1: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhavanti.
S06psp_4u:309_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām aśleṣo bhavati?
S06psp_4u:310_0: bhagavān āha: yaḥ subhūte rūpasyāśleṣaḥ sa rūpasyāsaṃbandho,
S06psp_4u:310_9_1: saptatriṃsatsu bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu āryasatyeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu aṣṭasu
S06psp_4u:310_10: yaḥ subhūte sarvākārajñatāyā aśleṣaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā asaṃbandho,
S06psp_4u:310_11: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā asaṃbandhaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo,
S06psp_4u:310_12: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā anirodho,
S06psp_4u:310_13: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anirodhaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā aśleṣaḥ.
S06psp_4u:310_14: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvadharmāśleṣāya dharman deśayanti.
S06psp_4u:311_0_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā
S06psp_4u:311_0_1: lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:311_1: yad rūpasya pāran na tad rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:311_3: yad vijñānasya pāran na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_4u:311_4: yat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pāran na te skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
S06psp_4u:311_5: yat sarvapāramitānāṃ pāran na tāḥ sarvapāramitāḥ,
S06psp_4u:311_6: yat sarvaśūnyatānāṃ pāran na tāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ,
S06psp_4u:311_7: yad bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāran na te bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
S06psp_4u:311_9: (PSP_4:98) yad āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ pāran na te āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_4u:311_10: yāvad yat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pāran na sā sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:311_11: yathā ca subhūte rūpan tathā sarvadharmās tathā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_4u:312_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan yathā sarvadharmās tathā rūpaṃ nanv abhisaṃbuddhair ca bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_4u:312_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan rūpasya pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti,
S06psp_4u:312_2: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:312_3: na vijñānasya pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti.
S06psp_4u:312_5: nābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti.
S06psp_4u:312_6: idaṃ rūpam iti, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, idaṃ vijñānam iti yāvad ime skandhā ime dhātava imāny āyatanāni ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ,
S06psp_4u:312_7: imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni imāḥ pāramitā imāḥ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāni imā abhijñā imā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_4u:313_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na hi subhūte rūpasya pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti,
S06psp_4u:313_1: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:313_3: evaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāñ ca pāre vikalpaḥ kaścin,
S06psp_4u:313_4: na pāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pāre vikalpaḥ kaścin,
S06psp_4u:313_6: evan na yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti.
S06psp_4u:313_7: api nu subhūte duṣkaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ya imān evaṃrūpān dharmān upanidhyāyanti na cāvalīyante.
S06psp_4u:313_9: evañ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyaitān dharmān evaṃśāntān evaṃpraṇītān prakāśayiṣyāma iti.
S06psp_4u:313_10: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti.
S06psp_4u:314_0_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_4u:314_0_1: lokasya dvīpā bhavanti? tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ye pradeśā udakaparicchinnā bhavanti
S06psp_4u:314_0_2: mahānadīṣu ca mahāsamudreṣu vā te subhūte dvīpā ity ucyante.
S06psp_4u:314_2: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ subhūte pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnam.
S06psp_4u:314_17: etac chāntam etat praṇītam etad yathātmyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:314_18: yad uta śūnyatānupalambho dharmo paricchedas tṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo virodho nirvāṇam.
S06psp_4u:314_19: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnān sarvadharmān deśayanto lokasya dvīpā bhavanti.
S06psp_4u:315_0_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_4u:315_0_1: lokasyāloko bhavati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dīrgharātram avidyāṇḍakośaparyavanaddhānāṃ
S06psp_4u:315_1: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasyāloko bhavati.
S06psp_4u:316_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām ulkādhāro bhavati prabhākaraḥ? iha subhūte (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:316_1_0: 100) bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya ya ime ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāś
S06psp_4u:316_1_1: catuḥsaṃgrahavastupratisaṃyuktāś ca sūtrāntās teṣām arthan tattvataḥ sattvebhyaḥ
S06psp_4u:316_2: sattvāṃś ca tatra niyojayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_4u:316_3: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām ulkādhāraḥ prabhākaro bhavati.
S06psp_4u:317_0_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_4u:317_0_1: sattvānāṃ sārthavāho bhavati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:317_0_2: abhisaṃbudhya kumārgasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāṃ caturgamanagāminām ekāyanaṃ mārgam
S06psp_4u:317_0_3: upadiśati sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye śokopadravāṇāṃ samatikramāya duḥkhadaurmanasyānām
S06psp_4u:317_1: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ sārthavāho bhavati.
S06psp_4u:318_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_4u:318_0_1: lokasya pariṇāyako bhavati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvanikāye mahākaruṇām
S06psp_4u:318_3: evaṃ dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāyā anutpādāyānirodhāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati.
S06psp_4u:318_4: upāyapāramitāyāḥ praṇidhānapāramitāyā balapāramitāyā jñānapāramitāyāś cānutpādāyānirodhāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati.
S06psp_4u:318_5: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāva śūnyatāyāś cānutpādāyānirodhāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati.
S06psp_4u:318_6: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām abhijñānāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyāsaṃkleśāyā vyavadānāya dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati.
S06psp_4u:318_7: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati.
S06psp_4u:318_8_0: evaṃ sarvasamādhīnām (PSP_4:101) sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ
S06psp_4u:318_8_1: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya
S06psp_4u:318_13: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ pariṇāyako bhavati.
S06psp_4u:319_0_0: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ
S06psp_4u:319_0_1: sattvānāṃ gatir bhavati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mūḍhānāṃ gatikānāṃ sattvānām
S06psp_4u:319_1: ākāśagatikaṃ rūpam iti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati,
S06psp_4u:319_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, ākāśagatikaṃ vijñānam iti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06psp_4u:319_3: ākāśagatikā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ceti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06psp_4u:319_4_0: evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_4u:319_6: anāgatigatikā rūpaśūnyatā sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati,
S06psp_4u:319_7: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, anāgatigatikā vijñānaśūnyatā sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06psp_4u:319_8: anāgatigatikā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāñ ca śūnyatā sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06psp_4u:319_9: evam anāgatigatikā sarvapāramitāsarvaśūnyatāsarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06psp_4u:319_10: (PSP_4:102) anāgatigatikā smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgaśūnyatā sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.

S06psp_4u:334_10: tat (PSP_4:108) kasya hetoḥ? atyantatayā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā na saṃvidyate na bodhisattvo na bodhisattvasaṃnāhas tenocyate,
S06psp_4u:334_11: yāvan na sarvākārajñatāsaṃbaddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃnāha iti.
S06psp_4u:334_12: sarvadharmasaṃbaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃnāho yair ayaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caradbhir evaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ,
S06psp_4u:335_0: subhūtir āha: asya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_4u:335_1: evaṃ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya sthānadvayan na pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā,
S06psp_4u:335_2_0: asthānam etat bhagavann anavakāśo 'yaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ
S06psp_4u:335_2_1: sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā paten
S06psp_4u:335_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sīmābaddhaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ.
S06psp_4u:336_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:336_1_0: kaṃ punas tvaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyann evaṃ vadasi? asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_4u:336_1_1: mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyān na dvayoḥ sthānayor anyatarānyataraṃ
S06psp_4u:336_1_2: sthānaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā.
S06psp_4u:337_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hi bhagavan na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ,
S06psp_4u:337_1: sarvasattvaparinirvāṇāya sarvākārajñatājñānasya kṛtaśo bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.
S06psp_4u:337_2: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ,
S06psp_4u:337_3: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ parinirvāṇāya sarvākārajñatājñānasya kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.
S06psp_4u:338_0: subhūtir āha: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sā na kenacid bhāvayitavyā na kvacin na kathaṃcid bhāvayitavyā.
S06psp_4u:338_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na (PSP_4:109) hi bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kasyacid dharmasya pariniṣpattir upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:338_2: yo vā bhāvayed yaṃ vā bhāvayed yena vā bhāvayet,
S06psp_4u:338_6: aparigrahabhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā.
S06psp_4u:339_0: bhagavān āha: kasya subhūte bhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06psp_4u:340_0: subhūtir āha: rūpabhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārabbhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_4u:340_4: dānapāramitābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā śīlapāramitābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_4u:340_9: adhyātmaśūnyatābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_4u:340_24: yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā.
S06psp_4u:341_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, rūpabhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_4u:341_9: evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanodharmaḥ manovijñāna manaḥsaṃsparśamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_4u:341_14_1: yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā avidyābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā
S06psp_4u:342_0: iha subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām upaparīkṣitavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti,
S06psp_4u:342_1: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nābhiniviśeta so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣitavyo,
S06psp_4u:342_2_0: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:342_2_1: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nābhiniviśeta so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06psp_4u:342_9: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ nābhiniviśeta so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06psp_4u:342_10: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na parabhāṣitāni na paramantritāni sārataḥ parataḥ paśyati so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_4u:342_11: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na parasya śraddhayā gacchati so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_4u:342_13_0: 112) gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rāgasahitaiś cittotpādaiḥ saṃhriyate
S06psp_4u:342_13_1: na doṣamohasahagataiś cittotpādaiḥ saṃhriyate so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06psp_4u:342_14_0: yaḥ kaścid avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:342_14_1: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06psp_4u:342_14_2: na cāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ prajñāpāramitayā cāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:342_15: abhinandati prajñāpāramitāśravaṇaṃ śrutvā codgṛhṇāti paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tathatvāya pratipadyate,
S06psp_4u:342_16_0: veditavyam etat subhūte pūrvāntato 'py anenāvinivartanīyena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_4u:342_16_1: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā udgṛhītā paryavāptā dhāritā vācitā yoniśaś ca
S06psp_4u:342_17_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:342_17_1: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06psp_4u:342_17_2: na cāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na pratyudāvartate uttare ca śrutvā udgṛhṇāti paryavāpnoti
S06psp_4u:342_17_3: dhārayati vācayati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tathatvāya pratipadyate.
S06psp_4u:343_0_0: subhūtir āha: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:343_0_1: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06psp_4u:343_1: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vyavacārayitavyā?
S06psp_4u:344_0: bhagavān āha: sarvākārajñatā nimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vyavacārayitavyā.
S06psp_4u:345_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvākārajñatā nimnayā saṃtatyā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati?
S06psp_4u:346_0: bhagavān āha: śūnyatānimnayā śūnyatāpravaṇayā śūnyatāprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati,
S06psp_4u:346_5: yāvad bhūtakoṭinimnayā bhūtakoṭipravaṇayā bhūtakoṭiprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā,
S06psp_4u:346_6: anabhisaṃskāranimnayānabhisaṃskārapravaṇayānabhisaṃskāraprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati.
S06psp_4u:346_10: pratibimbanimnayā gandharvanagaranimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati.
S06psp_4u:347_0: subhūtir āha: yad bhagavān evam āha, śūnyatānimnayā śūnyatāpravaṇayā śūnyatāprāgbhārayā saṃtatyā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati.
S06psp_4u:347_1_1: pravaṇayā prāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām iha gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:347_2: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpam api vyavacārayati? vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān,
S06psp_4u:347_3_0: vijñānam api vyavacārayati? evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni
S06psp_4u:347_4_1: vyavacārayati? kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvat sarvākārajñatām api
S06psp_4u:348_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ vyavacārayati,
S06psp_4u:348_1: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ vyavacārayati,
S06psp_4u:348_8: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ vyavacārayati.
S06psp_4u:348_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā na kenacit kṛtā na kutaścid āgatā na kvacid gatā nāpi kvacit sthitā na deśasthā na pradeśasthā na tasyāḥ saṃkhyā upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:348_11: yasyāś ca na saṃkhyā na gamanaṃ nāgamanam upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:348_13: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārair na vijñānena na skandhair na dhātubhir nāyatanair na pratītyasamutpādena na pratītyasamutpādāṅgair,
S06psp_4u:348_14: na dānena na śīlena na kṣāntyā na vīryeṇa na dhyānena na prajñayā yāvan na sarvākārajñatā jñānenābhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_4u:348_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpam eva sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:348_17: vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yā ca rūpasya tathatā,
S06psp_4u:348_19: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:348_20: yā ca vijñānasya tathatā, yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā,
S06psp_4u:348_21: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:348_24: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:348_27: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:348_28: evaṃ yā ca pāramitātathatā, yā ca śūnyatātathatā, yā ca bodhipakṣyadharmatathatā,
S06psp_4u:348_31: yā ca vimokṣamukhatathatā, yā cābhijñātathatā, yā ca daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvittathatā,
S06psp_4u:348_34: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:349_0_0: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā divyāni candanacūrṇāni gṛhītvā divyāny
S06psp_4u:349_1: kṣiptvā ca (PSP_4:115) yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tiṣṭhan,
S06psp_4u:349_2: ekānte sthitāś ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:349_3_0: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhātarkātarkāvacarā śāntā śūkṣmā
S06psp_4u:349_3_1: nipuṇapaṇḍitavijñavedanīyā sarvalokavipratyanīkā yad uta tathāgatānāṃ bodhir yatra
S06psp_4u:349_4: evaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām evaṃ nipuṇāṃ nirdiśanti,
S06psp_4u:349_6: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva vijñānam.
S06psp_4u:349_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā ca rūpasya tathatā,
S06psp_4u:349_8: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:349_9: yā ca vedanāyās tathatā, yā ca saṃjñāyās tathatā, yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā, yā ca vijñānasya tathatā, yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:349_14: evaṃ yā ca yāvad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:349_15: yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_0: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacārān rūpāvacārāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:350_2: rūpam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:350_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, vijñānam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā vijñānam.
S06psp_4u:350_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā ca rūpasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:350_5: yā ca vedanāyās tathatā yā ca saṃjñāyās tathatā yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:350_6: yā ca vijñānasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā ca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_11: 116) dānapāramitā, evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:350_12: prajñāpāramitaiva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_4u:350_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā ca dānapāramitātathatā,
S06psp_4u:350_16: yā ca prajñāpāramitātathatā, yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_19: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyās tathatā,
S06psp_4u:350_20: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā ca smṛtyupasthānatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_27: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattitathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayāadvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_30: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:350_31: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_32: evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhā,
S06psp_4u:350_34: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:350_35: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:350_36: idam api devaputrā arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgato 'lpotsukatāyāṃ cittaṃ nāmayāmāsa na dharmadeśanāyām.
S06psp_4u:350_38: 117) dharmo durdṛśo duranubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ śāntaḥ śūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīko yad uteyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ bodhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:350_39: sā na kenacid abhisaṃbuddhā na kadācid abhisaṃbuddhā na kvacid abhisaṃbuddhā iyaṃ sā dharmāṇāṃ gambhīratā dharmatā yatra na dvayasamudācāro nādvayasamudācāraḥ saṃvidyate.

S06psp_4u:485_2: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyapariśuddhiś ca vākpariśuddhiś ca cittapariśuddhiś ca,
S06psp_4u:485_3: sa tayā kāyapariśuddhyā vākpariśuddhyā cittapariśuddhyā ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ cātikrāmati.
S06psp_4u:485_5: 147) kāyapariśuddhiś ca vākpariśuddhiś ca cittapariśuddhiś ca,
S06psp_4u:485_6: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:486_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na lābhasatkāraguruko bhavati na piṇḍapātaguruko bhavati yāvan na cīvaraguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:486_2: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:487_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na mātsaryacittam
S06psp_4u:487_0_1: utpadyate na dauḥśīlyacittam utpadyate na kṣubdhacittam utpadyate na kausīdyacittam
S06psp_4u:487_0_2: utpadyate nāsamāhitacittam utpadyate na dauṣprajñācittam utpadyate nerṣyācittam utpadyate
S06psp_4u:487_0_3: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:488_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthirabuddhiś ca bhavati satkṛtya ca parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06psp_4u:488_1: yat kiṃcit parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti tat sarvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃsyandayati yāni tāni laukikāni kṛtyāni tāni sarvāṇi prajñāpāramitām āgamya dharmatayā saṃsyandayati,
S06psp_4u:488_3: yo dharmadhātau na yujyate sarvaṃ taṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujyamānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:489_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_4u:489_0_1: aṣṭau mahānirayān purato 'bhinirmāya tatraikaikasmin mahāniraye bahūni bodhisattvaśatāni
S06psp_4u:489_0_2: bahūni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_4u:489_0_3: dahyamānāni pacyamānāni duḥkhī tīvrī kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhavamānāny (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:489_1: 148) abhinirmiṇoti, evaṃ ca vakṣyati: ime te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyās tathāgatair vyākṛtās teṣu mahānarakeṣūpapannās,
S06psp_4u:489_2: tvam api nairayikas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
S06psp_4u:489_4: punar eva tvam etad bodhicittaṃ pratiniḥsṛjya,
S06psp_4u:490_0: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:490_1: veditavyaṃ vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
S06psp_4u:490_2_0: niyato 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaivartyadhātau sthānaṃ subhūte 'navakāśo yad
S06psp_4u:490_2_1: avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo narake vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā asureṣu
S06psp_4u:490_3: naitat sthānaṃ vidyate, ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:491_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:491_1: yat tvayā pūrvaśrutaṃ, evaṃ mayā dānapāramitā pariśodhayitavyā,
S06psp_4u:491_4: evaṃ mayā vīryapāramitā pariśodhayitavyā evaṃ mayā dhyānapāramitā pariśodhayitavyā,
S06psp_4u:491_6: evaṃ mayā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā,
S06psp_4u:491_7_0: tat sarvaṃ pratideśaya yat tvayā pūrvam atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
S06psp_4u:491_7_1: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat saddharmasthitir
S06psp_4u:491_7_2: etasminn antare yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam anumoditan tat pratideśaya tan nisṛja,
S06psp_4u:491_8: yad etat tvayā śrutaṃ naitad buddhavacanaṃ naitat samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitaṃ kavikṛtakaṃ kāvyam etat,
S06psp_4u:491_9: yad ahaṃ bhāṣe etad buddhavacanam etat tathāgatena bhāṣitam.
S06psp_4u:491_10: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣubhyati kāṅkṣati vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:491_11: veditavyam evam eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyākṛtas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
S06psp_4u:492_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kṣubhyati na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:492_3_0: aparapraṇeyaś ca bhavati, dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:492_3_1: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām aparapraṇeyaś ca bhavati yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:492_4: tadyathāpi nāma arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur na parasya śraddhayā gacchati pratyakṣakārī dharmatāyām asaṃhāryo bhavati māreṇa pāpīyasā.
S06psp_4u:492_5: evam eva subhūte 'navamardanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā,
S06psp_4u:492_6: apratyudāvartanīyadharmā ca bhavati śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā buddhayānikair vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:492_7: niyato 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyadhātau sthito 'parapraṇeyaś ca bhavati,
S06psp_4u:492_8: sa tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāpi śraddhayā na gacchati,
S06psp_4u:492_9: prāg eva śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā buddhayānikānāṃ vā prāg eva mārasya pāpīyasaḥ,
S06psp_4u:492_10: prāg evānyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ vā śraddhayā gacchen naitat sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_4u:492_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:492_12: yasya śraddhayā gacched rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskārāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā,
S06psp_4u:492_13: rūpatathatāyā vā vedanātathatāyā vā saṃjñātathatāyā vā saṃskāratathatāyā vā vijñānatathatāyā vā,
S06psp_4u:492_14_3: anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathatān
S06psp_4u:492_15: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:493_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣenāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:494_0: sa khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgapratirūpakam upadekṣyati,
S06psp_4u:494_1: yo 'sau mārgapratirūpakaḥ saṃsārāvacarair laukikair ākārair yadi vāsti saṃjñā yadi vā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upadekṣyati:
S06psp_4u:494_2: ayam āyuṣman mārgaḥ, iyaṃ pratipad yena mārgeṇa yayā pratipadā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpsyasi,
S06psp_4u:494_4: anenāyuṣman mārgeṇānayā pratipadā ihaiva tvaṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kuru,
S06psp_4u:494_5: na tu tāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyasi,
S06psp_4u:494_6: aho batāyam ihaiva tavātmabhāvo na nirvṛtto bhavet,
S06psp_4u:494_7: kutas tvam anyam ātmabhāvaṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:495_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06psp_4u:495_1: uttare cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo 'yaṃ mārgapratirūpakam upadiśati,
S06psp_4u:495_8: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo mamaitāny aṅgāny upadiśati,
S06psp_4u:495_9: yāni mayaivaṃ buddhvā sarveṣv api triṣu yāneṣu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_4u:496_0: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ harṣitaṃ viditvā evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:496_1_0: icchasi tvaṃ kulaputra tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān draṣṭuṃ yair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair
S06psp_4u:496_2_0: gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dānapāramitā
S06psp_4u:496_2_1: paripūritā śīlapāramitā paripūritā kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā vīryapāramitā paripūritā
S06psp_4u:496_3: gaṅgānadīvālukopamāś caiva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛcchitāḥ paripraśnīkṛtā,
S06psp_4u:496_4_0: asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair bodhisattvayāne
S06psp_4u:496_4_1: sthātavyaṃ? kathaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:496_4_2: caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
S06psp_4u:496_5_2: mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ caratā sthātavyam? yathā tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ākhyātaṃ
S06psp_4u:496_5_3: tathā sthitvā tathā caritvā tathā yogam āpadyāpi tair eva tāvad bodhisattvair mahāsattvair
S06psp_4u:496_6: tathā caritais tathānuśāsitais tathā sthitais tathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvākārajñatā nānuprāptā,
S06psp_4u:496_7: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyasi?
S06psp_4u:497_0: saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ vivecyamānasya cittasyānyathātvaṃ na bhavati nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:497_2: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo mamaitāny aṅgāny upadiśati,
S06psp_4u:497_3: yair aṅgaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpyate sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat sarvākārajñatānuprāpyate.
S06psp_4u:498_0: tataḥ sa punar māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittasyānavalīnatāṃ viditvā tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe saṃbahulān bhikṣūn abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_4u:498_1: evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate: ime te 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravā ye te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā abhūvaṃs te 'rhattve sthitāḥ,
S06psp_4u:498_2: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase?
S06psp_4u:499_2: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratyudāvartyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
S06psp_4u:499_3_0: uttare cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, asthānam anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:499_3_1: caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:499_3_2: caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran
S06psp_4u:499_4: smṛtyupasthāneṣu caran samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu caran sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu carann apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu caran,
S06psp_4u:500_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:500_1_0: saced evaṃ śikṣitvā yathā tathāgatenākhyātaṃ tayā caryayāvirahitasyaibhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_4u:500_1_1: manasikārair avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate dānapāramitayā na parihīyate
S06psp_4u:500_1_2: śīlapāramitayā na parihīyate kṣāntipāramitayā na parihīyate vīryapāramitayā na parihīyate
S06psp_4u:500_1_3: dhyānapāramitayā na parihīyate prajñāpāramitayā na parihīyate adhyātmaśūnyatayā na
S06psp_4u:500_1_5: na parihīyate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhir na parihīyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñābhir
S06psp_4u:501_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:501_1_0: yo mārakarmāṇi budhyate sa na parihīyate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ebhiḥ subhūte
S06psp_4u:501_1_1: ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_4u:502_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:502_1: kuto bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti prajñāyate.
S06psp_4u:503_2: dhātusaṃjñāyā āyatanasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃjñāyā rāgasaṃjñāyā doṣasaṃjñāyā mohasaṃjñāyā dṛṣṭisaṃjñāyāḥ,
S06psp_4u:503_3: dānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ śīlapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ vīryapāramitāsaṃjñāyā dhyānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāsaṃjñāyā vivartito,
S06psp_4u:503_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmair bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntaḥ.
S06psp_4u:503_12: sa tam api dharmaṃ nopalabhate anupalabhamāno nābhisaṃskaroty anabhisaṃskurvan notpādayati tenocyate 'nutpādakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya ity,
S06psp_4u:503_13: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:504_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vicchandayiṣyati:
S06psp_4u:504_1: ākāśasamaiṣā yad uta sarvākārajñatā ākāśabhāvanaiṣā abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:504_2: ete 'pi dharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā na cākāśasamair dharmair abhāvasvabhāvaiḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyaiḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:504_3: yo vābhisaṃbudhyate yena vābhisaṃbudhyate yaṃ vābhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:504_4: sarva ete ākāśasamā dharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā nirarthakaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase mārakarma etat paridīpitaṃ yad iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhavyā,
S06psp_4u:504_6: tasmāt tvaṃ kulaputra pratiprasrambhaya etān manasikārān mā te dīrgharātram anarthāya duṣkhāya vinipātāya saṃvarterann iti.
S06psp_4u:504_7: tatra tair bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tāḥ paribhāṣāḥ śrutvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:504_8: mārakarmāṇo tāni yo me 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati kiṃ cāpy ākāśasamāḥ sarvadharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās,
S06psp_4u:504_9_0: tān sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante tān vayam ākāśasamān abhāvasvabhāvān
S06psp_4u:504_9_1: sarvadharmān svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāsaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbuddhya sattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:504_14: tatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya imān dharmān śrutvā dṛḍhacittair bhavitavyam aprakampacittair bhavitavyam asaṃhāryacittair bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:504_15: ta ime yair dṛḍhacittatāyai aprakampacittatāyai asaṃhāryacittatāyai samanvāgatāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranto bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:505_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:505_1: kiṃ punar bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ utāho vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:506_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:507_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ? kathaṃ ca vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:507_1: bhagavān āha: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā vinivartito 'yaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:507_2: yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā na vinivartito 'yaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:507_3: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgatasyāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:507_4: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo māreṇa pāpīyasā na śakyate vivecayitum anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:508_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:508_3: ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni samāpadyate samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:508_6: imaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir nirodhasamāpattibhiś ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:508_7: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgam āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:508_10_0: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhṇāti na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ parigṛhṇāti
S06psp_4u:508_10_1: na pratyekabodhiṃ parigṛhṇāti ākāṅkṣamāṇa evaṃ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāvena
S06psp_4u:508_10_2: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti tam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir
S06psp_4u:508_10_3: liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:509_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manasikāreṇa samanvāgato bodhicittenāvirahito na rūpaguruko bhavati na kṣaṇaguruko bhavati nāsravaguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:509_1: na dānaguruko bhavati na śīlaguruko bhavati na kṣāntiguruko bhavati na vīryaguruko bhavati na dhyānaguruko bhavati na prajñāguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:509_2_0: nāpramāṇaguruko bhavati nārūpyaguruko bhavati na samāpattiguruko bhavati nābhijñāguruko
S06psp_4u:509_2_1: bhavati na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyadharmaguruko bhavati na sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiguruko
S06psp_4u:509_2_2: bhavati na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaguruko bhavati nāryasatyaguruko bhavati na vaiśāradyaguruko
S06psp_4u:509_2_3: bhavati na pratisaṃvidguruko bhavati na samyaksaṃbodhiguruko bhavati na sattvaparipācanaguruko
S06psp_4u:509_2_4: bhavati na buddhadarśanaguruko bhavati na kuśalamūlāvaropanaguruko bhavati.
S06psp_4u:509_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te sarvadharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ.
S06psp_4u:509_4_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ane imena ca manasikāreṇa
S06psp_4u:509_4_1: samanvāgataś caturbhiś ceryāpathair abhikrāmati na pratikrāmati na bhrāntacitta āgacchati
S06psp_4u:509_5: 156) na ca sthāsyati na niṣīdiṣyati na śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sa smṛta evāgamiṣyati gamiṣyati caṅkramiṣyati sthāsyati niṣīdiṣyati śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:509_6: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:510_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ paripācanāya pañcakāmaguṇān upadiśati sarvasattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:510_1: annam annārthikānāṃ, pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti,
S06psp_4u:510_3: parāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_4u:510_4: ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_4u:510_9: ye cānye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_4u:511_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasan jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:511_1: evaṃ cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ yāvat trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:511_2: na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte satatasamitaṃ brahmacārī bhavati,
S06psp_4u:511_3: na ca kasyacid avamardanākāraṃ janayati yenāvamardanākāreṇa paro 'nāttamanāḥ syāt,
S06psp_4u:511_4: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:512_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitaṃ vajrapānir yakṣaḥ sadānubaddho bhaviṣyaty,
S06psp_4u:512_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_4u:512_2: yathā mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satatasamitaṃ samanubaddho yāvat pañcavajrapāṇi kulāni satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:512_3: sa na śakyate manuṣyair amanuṣyair vāvakramanāyānavamardanīyo (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:512_4: 157) bhavati sa devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punarloke sahadharmeṇa.
S06psp_4u:513_0: tasya cittaṃ na vikṣipyate bodhimanasikārād yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:513_1: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nendriyāṇi vikalāni bhavanti śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ sa satpuruṣo bhaviṣyati nāsatpuruṣaḥ.
S06psp_4u:514_0: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ?
S06psp_4u:515_0: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhicittaṃ na vinaṅkṣyate,
S06psp_4u:515_1: etāvatā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ,
S06psp_4u:515_2: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:516_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimanasikāraiḥ samanvāgato yāni tāni
S06psp_4u:516_0_1: strīṇām āveśanāni vaśīkaraṇāni mantravidyauṣadhibhaiṣajyāni tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa
S06psp_4u:516_0_2: sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvan na prayukte na ca prayojayati na ca strīṇām āveśanam anyatarānyataraṃ
S06psp_4u:516_1: na striyāḥ puruṣasya vā ādeśanāprātihāryaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:516_2: putro vā te bhaviṣyati dhītā vā te bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:516_3: kulodgato vā bhaviṣyati, dīrghāyuṣko vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:516_4: sa nimittam asamanupaśyan, pariśuddhājīvo viharati, ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:517_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni
S06psp_4u:517_0_1: liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo
S06psp_4u:517_1: tān ākārāṃs tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:517_2: tāni śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'ham,
S06psp_4u:517_3: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt.
S06psp_4u:518_0: bhagavān etad avocat: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimanasikārair avirahito na skandhayogam anuyukto (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:518_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya hīnatvaṃ vā utkṛṣṭatvaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:519_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyāharaṇaṃ vā haranaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:520_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyālpatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:521_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyānunayaṃ vā pratighaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:521_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya nicayaṃ vāsaṃnicayaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:521_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa ākāśaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vāsaṃgrahaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:521_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte koṭyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyātyayaṃ vānatyayaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:521_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? atyantaviśuddhatvāt sarvadharmāṇām anyatra prajñāpāramitākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:522_0: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caran na mātsaryakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:522_1: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran na dauḥśīlyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:522_2: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran na pratighakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:522_3: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran na kauśīdyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:522_4: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran na vikṣepakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:522_5: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dauṣprajñākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:522_6: sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ viharan dharmakāmaś caiva bhavati nādharmakāmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:522_7: sa dharmadhātau caran na bhedyasya dharmasya varṇavādī (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:522_8_0: 159) bhavati, samitrakāmo bhavati nāmitrakāmo buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:522_8_1: ca mahāsattvānāṃ ye ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikāḥ kulaputrās tān apy anuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:522_10: darśanāya yatra lokadhātau tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:522_11: ākāṅkṣaṃs tatropapadyate, sa imair manasikārair rātriṃdivaṃ viharati yad uta buddhamanasikāraiḥ.
S06psp_4u:522_12_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prāyeṇa subhūte 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S06psp_4u:522_12_1: kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktān manasikārān utpādayitvā daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathair vartamānāḥ
S06psp_4u:522_13: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:522_14: tatra prathamaṃ dhyānam utpādayitvā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim utpādayitvā tatropapadyante,
S06psp_4u:522_15: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:522_16: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:523_0_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:523_0_1: carato 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya smṛtyupasthāne
S06psp_4u:523_1: avinivartanīyo vāhaṃ na vāham avinivartanīya iti vicikitsā cāsya notpadyate.
S06psp_4u:523_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi so 'ṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:523_4: yo vivartate vā na vā vivartate.
S06psp_4u:523_5_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphalabhūmau sthito na kāṅkṣati na
S06psp_4u:523_5_1: vicikitsati svakāyāṃ bhūmāv evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvabhūmau sthito buddhabhūmau
S06psp_4u:523_6: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati.
S06psp_4u:523_7: (PSP_4:160) sa tatrāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthito buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_4u:523_8: sattvāṃś ca paripācayaty, utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇi budhyate,
S06psp_4u:523_10: sarvāṇi ca tāni mārakarmāṇi budhyate buddhvā ca vidhvastāni viralīkaroti.
S06psp_4u:523_11: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakarmakārī ānantaryacittenāvirahito yāvan maraṇakālam ity anuvartata eva tad ānantaryacittaṃ,
S06psp_4u:523_13: anuvartate cāsya tat paryutthānaṃ yāvan maraṇakālam.
S06psp_4u:523_14: evam eva subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ bhūtaṃ sthitam avinivartanīyabhūmāv avikampan tac cittaṃ,
S06psp_4u:523_16_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuram atikramya samyaktvaniyāmam
S06psp_4u:523_16_1: avakrāntaṃ sa svakāyāṃ bhūmau sthitvābhijñāparamapāramitāḥ prāpya buddhakṣetraṃ ca
S06psp_4u:523_17: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati, buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06psp_4u:523_18: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayitvā tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati paripraśnayati paryupāste.
S06psp_4u:524_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathā sthitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:524_1: sa māna utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇy avabudhyate,
S06psp_4u:524_2: utpannotpannānāñ ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena na gacchati,
S06psp_4u:524_3: tāni ca mārakarmāṇy upāyakauśalyena bhūtakoṭīḥ śodhayati,
S06psp_4u:524_4: svakāyāñ ca bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati.
S06psp_4u:524_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa niḥkāṅkṣo bhūtakoṭyāḥ,
S06psp_4u:524_6: na bhūtakoṭim ekāṃ vā dve vā vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:524_7: tasya jātivinivṛttasyāpi na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpadyate.
S06psp_4u:524_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:525_0: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyate.
S06psp_4u:525_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_4u:526_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthitaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,
S06psp_4u:526_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati.
S06psp_4u:527_0: sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:527_3: na ca tvayānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdho,
S06psp_4u:527_4: yena tvaṃ vyākriyathās tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:527_5: na ca tvayi te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:527_6: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_4u:528_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:528_1: na ca cittasyānyathā tvaṃ bhavati veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:528_2: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyākṛto 'haṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_4u:528_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mama te dharmāḥ saṃvidyante yair dharmair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākriyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_4u:529_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:529_1: mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣaḥ śrāvakatve tvaṃ kulaputra vyākṛto na tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:530_0: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:530_1: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkrānto mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
S06psp_4u:530_2: na ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā samādāpayati.
S06psp_4u:531_0: saced ayam asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:531_1: naitad buddhabhāṣitaṃ na śrāvakair mārabhāṣitāny etāni sūtrāṇi yatra tvaṃ carasi.
S06psp_4u:531_2: veditavyam etad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
S06psp_4u:531_4: veditavyam etat subhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:531_5: 162) arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau.
S06psp_4u:531_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ta ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06psp_4u:531_7: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:532_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartaniyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti.
S06psp_4u:532_1: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenaiva yogam āpadyate 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoti.
S06psp_4u:532_2_0: tatra kataro dharmo yasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti
S06psp_4u:532_2_1: jīvitaparityāgam api karoti? iha subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ
S06psp_4u:532_3: tatraike mohapuruṣāḥ pratikrośanti prativahanti naiṣa dharmo na vinayo naitac chāstuḥ śāsanam,
S06psp_4u:532_4: asya subhūte kṛtaśo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti.
S06psp_4u:532_6: ye 'pi te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyante,
S06psp_4u:532_7_0: aham api tatra gaṇanāṃ yāsyāmy aham api tatra vyākṛto mamāpy eṣa dharmo yasya dharmasya
S06psp_4u:532_7_1: kṛtenāham ātmaparityāgaṃ karomi jīvitaparityāgaṃ karomīmaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya
S06psp_4u:532_7_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgaṃ karoti jīvitaparityāgaṃ
S06psp_4u:532_8: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:533_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:533_1: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvam udgṛhṇāti tathodgṛhītañ ca samānaṃ na vipraṇāśayati.
S06psp_4u:533_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi tad dhāraṇīpratilabdhatvāt.
S06psp_4u:534_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:534_1: katamasyā bhagavan dhāraṇyāḥ pratilabdhatvād bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti?
S06psp_4u:535_0: bhagavān āha: dhāraṇadhāraṇīpratilabdhasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti.
S06psp_4u:536_0_0: subhūtir āha: tathāgatasyaiva bhagavann arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na śrāvakabhāṣitāni
S06psp_4u:536_0_1: na devabhāṣitāni na nāgabhāṣitāni na yakṣabhāṣitāni na gandharvabhāṣitāni nāsurabhāṣitāni
S06psp_4u:536_0_2: na garuḍabhāṣitāni na kiṃnarabhāṣitāni na mahoragabhāṣitāni.
S06psp_4u:537_0: bhagavān āha: ye kecit subhūte rutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ sarvatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati.
S06psp_4u:537_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma tad dhāraṇadhāraṇīpratilabdhatvād,
S06psp_4u:537_2: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:538_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:539_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat mahāguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_4u:539_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anenānantam aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdham asaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhais,
S06psp_4u:539_4: tatra ca jñāne sthitvāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharati yābhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir abhinirhṛtābhiḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyaḥ paryādātum.
S06psp_4u:540_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:540_1_1: mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān ākāraliṅganimittāni nirdeṣṭuṃ yair ākārair
S06psp_4u:540_1_2: yair liṅgair yair nimittair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prabhāvyate sādhu
S06psp_4u:540_1_3: bhagavan gambhīrāṇi gambhirāṇi sthānāni nirdiśatu yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_4u:540_1_4: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_4u:541_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:541_1: sādhu sādhu subhūte, sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām arthāya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni paripṛcchitavyāni manyase,
S06psp_4u:541_2_0: gambhīram iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam ānimittasyāpraṇihitasyānabhisaṃskārasyānutpādasyānirodhasyānirvāṇasyāśāntasya
S06psp_4u:541_2_1: tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer dharmadhātor imāni tāni subhūte gambhīragambhīrāṇi sthānāni
S06psp_4u:541_2_2: yeṣām etad adhivacanaṃ yad idaṃ nirvāṇam iti.
S06psp_4u:542_0: subhūtir āha: nirvāṇasyaivaitad bhagavann adhivacanaṃ na punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām?
S06psp_4u:542_1: bhagavān āha: sarvadharmāṇām evaitat subhūte 'dhivacanaṃ gambhīram iti.
S06psp_4u:542_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ subhūte gambhīram,
S06psp_4u:542_3: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam api subhūte gambhīraṃ,
S06psp_4u:542_5: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi subhūte gambhīraṃ,
S06psp_4u:542_15: evam abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ subhūte gambhīraḥ.
S06psp_4u:542_17: 'vidyā subhūte gambhīrā, evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātir jarāmaraṇaṃ śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ subhūte gambhīrāḥ,
S06psp_4u:542_23: bodhir api subhūte gambhīrā. kathañ ca punaḥ subhūte rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ? yathā rūpatathatā tathā gambhīraṃ,
S06psp_4u:542_33: yathā bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā tathā gambhīraṃ,
S06psp_4u:543_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasya tathatā?
S06psp_4u:544_0: bhagavān āha: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na rūpaṃ nānyatra rūpād,
S06psp_4u:544_1: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na vedanā nānyatra vedanāyāḥ,
S06psp_4u:544_2: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na saṃjñā nānyatra saṃjñayāḥ,
S06psp_4u:544_3: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na saṃskārā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo,
S06psp_4u:544_4: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na vijñānaṃ nānyatra vijñānād.
S06psp_4u:544_5: evaṃ yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanāni nānyatra skandhadhātvāyatanebhyo,
S06psp_4u:544_6: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na pratītyasamutpādo nānyatra pratītyasamutpādād,
S06psp_4u:544_7: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na pratītyasamutpādaṅgāni nānyatra pratītyasamutpādāṅgebhyo,
S06psp_4u:544_8: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na sarvapāramitā nānyatra sarvapāramitābhyo,
S06psp_4u:544_9: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na sarvaśūnyatā nānyatra sarvaśūnyatābhyo,
S06psp_4u:544_10: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nānyatra bodhipakṣebhyo dharmebhyo,
S06psp_4u:544_13: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ nāveṇikābuddhadharmā nānyatrāveṇikebhyo buddhadharmebhyo,
S06psp_4u:544_14: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na bodhir nānyatra bodheḥ tathatā.
S06psp_4u:545_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:545_1: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat sūkṣmeṇopāyenāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpataś ca vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam.
S06psp_4u:545_3: vijñānataś ca vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitaṃ,
S06psp_4u:545_4: sarvadharmasaṃgrahe 'py asya laukikalokottareṇa sāsraveṇānāsraveṇa sāsravāṇāsravebhyo vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam.
S06psp_4u:546_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:546_1: yadā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīragambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyaty upanidhyāsyati.
S06psp_4u:547_0: evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ājñaptam,
S06psp_4u:547_1: evaṃ mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ākhyātam,
S06psp_4u:547_2: evaṃ mayā pratipattavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām uddiṣṭam ity.
S06psp_4u:547_3: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathā saṃpādayaṃs tathopanidhyāyaṃs tathopaparīkṣamāṇas tathā prayujyamānas tathā ghaṭamānas tathā vyāyacchamānaḥ.
S06psp_4u:548_0: sa tena cittotpādenāsaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇakuśalamūlaṃ parigrahīṣyaty aparimāṇāt kalpāt saṃsārāc chorayiṣyati vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyati vyantīkariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:548_1: kaḥ punar vādo yadāvyavakīrṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃś caran bodhipratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vihariṣyati.
S06psp_4u:548_2_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritas tasyānyatarayā striyā
S06psp_4u:548_2_1: sārdham abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt sā ca strī paraparigṛhītā
S06psp_4u:548_3: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte kiṃ pratisaṃyuktās tasya puruṣasya vitarkā varterann iti.
S06psp_4u:549_0: subhūtir āha: strīpratisaṃyuktā evaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya puruṣasya vitarkā varterann,
S06psp_4u:549_1: iyaṃ me strī āgatā etayā sārdhaṃ niṣīdiṣyāmi pratikramiṣyāmi paricārayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_4u:550_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte rātryā vā divasasya vātyayena kiyantas tasya puruṣasya vitarkā varteran.
S06psp_4u:551_0: subhūtir āha: bahavo bhagavan bahavaḥ sugata tasya puruṣasya divasasya vātyayena rātryā vātyayena vitarkā varteran.
S06psp_4u:552_0: bhagavān āha: yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasya vātyayena rātryā vātyayena vitarkā vartante,
S06psp_4u:552_1_0: iyataḥ kalpān sa bodhi sattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃsārāc chorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti vyantīkaroti
S06psp_4u:552_1_1: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ śikṣate upaparīkṣate upanidhyāyati
S06psp_4u:552_2: yathā yathā tān doṣān vivarjayati yair doṣair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:552_3_0: evaṃ yogan anuyuktasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānena vihāreṇa viharato
S06psp_4u:552_3_1: yathā prajñāpāramitāyām upadiṣṭāyām ekadivasena yat kuśalamūlaṃ yena kuśalamūlena
S06psp_4u:552_4_0: nedaṃ tasya kuśalasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm
S06psp_4u:552_4_1: api yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam
S06psp_4u:552_4_2: api upaniśām api upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
S06psp_4u:553_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt triṣu ratneṣu buddharatne dharmaratne saṃgharatne.
S06psp_4u:553_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_4u:554_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_4u:555_0: bhagavān āha: ayam eva tataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06psp_4u:555_1: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
S06psp_4u:555_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣa hi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgo yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_4u:556_0: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06psp_4u:556_1: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiṣv anāgāmiṣv arhatsu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_4u:556_2: pratyekabuddheṣu tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06psp_4u:556_3: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_4u:557_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_4u:558_0: bhagavān āha: ayam eva tataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_4u:558_1: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
S06psp_4u:558_2_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim
S06psp_4u:558_2_1: atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_4u:559_0_0: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
S06psp_4u:559_0_1: kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ
S06psp_4u:559_0_2: samāpadyeta prajñāṃ bhāvayet tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_4u:560_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_4u:561_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_4u:561_1: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvaikadivasam api dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ samāpadyeta prajñāṃ bhāvayet.
S06psp_4u:561_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? mātaiṣā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā janayitrī caiṣā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_4u:561_3: atra hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān paripūrayanti.
S06psp_4u:562_0: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan sattvebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadyāt.
S06psp_4u:562_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_4u:563_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_4u:564_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06psp_4u:564_1: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvaikadivasam api sattvebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadyāt.
S06psp_4u:564_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaḥ (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:564_3: 169) sa sarvākārajñatayāvirahito yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayāvirahitaḥ,

S06psp_4u:568_1: 170) virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhaṃs tad āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānaṃ tābhyāṃ pratisaṃlayanapratisaṃyuktān manasikārān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet.
S06psp_4u:568_2: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_4u:569_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_4u:570_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,

S06psp_4u:571_0_1: gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhann atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ

S06psp_4u:571_2: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_4u:572_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,

S06psp_4u:572_3: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitānumodanāpariṇāmanā kuśalamūlena bhavitavyam.
S06psp_4u:573_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:573_1: yadā punar bhagavann abhisaṃskāraḥ kalpita ity ukto bhagavatā tadā kathaṃ sa (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:573_2_0: 171) kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet? na ca bhagavann abhisaṃskāreṇa
S06psp_4u:573_2_1: śakyā samyagdṛṣṭir vā niyāmo vāvakramituṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vānuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_4u:573_2_2: vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vānuprāptuṃ pratyekāṃ vā bodhim anuprāptum anuttarāṃ
S06psp_4u:574_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na hy abhisaṃskāreṇa śakyā samyagdṛṣṭir
S06psp_4u:574_0_1: vā niyāmo vāvakramituṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā anuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_4u:574_0_2: vā arhattvaṃ vānuprāptuṃ pratyekāṃ vā bodhim anuprāptum anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:574_1: sa cāpi subhūte abhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka evākhyāyate,
S06psp_4u:574_2_0: riktaka evākhyāyate, tucchaka evākhyāyate, asāraka evākhyāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:574_2_1: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito bahirdhāśūnyatāyām
S06psp_4u:575_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo iha śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā yathā yathābhisaṃskārān pratyavekṣate tathā tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:575_1: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati tathā tathāsaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

S06psp_4u:576_0: subhūtir āha: asaṃkhyeyasya ca bhagavann aprameyasya cāparimāṇasya ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ? kiṃ nānākaraṇam?
S06psp_4u:577_0: bhagavān āha: asaṃkhyeyam iti subhūte yasya saṃkhyā na vidyate yaḥ saṃkhyān nopaiti,
S06psp_4u:577_1: asaṃkhyeyam iti vā apramāṇam iti vā subhūte yasya pramāṇan nopalabhyate 'tītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu,

S06psp_4u:578_0: subhūtir āha: syād bhagavan paryāyo yad rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:578_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api bhagavann asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
S06psp_4u:579_0: bhagavān āha: syāt subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:579_2: vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syād ity asaṃkhyeyādīnām upalakṣaṇām.
S06psp_4u:580_0: katamena bhagavan paryāyeṇa rūpam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:580_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt?
S06psp_4u:581_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃ khyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:581_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
S06psp_4u:582_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpam eva śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:582_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam eva śūnyaṃ, na punaḥ sarvadharmā api śūnyāḥ?
S06psp_4u:583_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte na mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity ākhyātāḥ.
S06psp_4u:584_0: subhūtir āha: śūnyā iti bhagavan sarvadharmās tathāgatenākhyātā,
S06psp_4u:584_1: ye ca bhagavan śūnyā akṣayā api te,
S06psp_4u:584_2: asaṃkhyeyā api te aprameyā api te,
S06psp_4u:584_3: aparimāṇā api te, na bhagavan śūnyatāyāḥ saṃkhyopalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:584_4: na pramāṇam upalabhyate, na parimāṇam upalabhyate, ity asaṃkhyeyādīnāṃ svabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:584_5: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_4u:585_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_4u:585_2_0: akṣayam iti vā asaṃkhyeyam iti vā aprameyam iti vā aparimāṇam iti vā śūnyam iti vā
S06psp_4u:585_2_1: ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā anabhisaṃskāram iti vā anutpāda iti vā virāga
S06psp_4u:585_2_2: iti vā nirodha iti vā nirvāṇam iti vā deśanāniṣpandanirdeśa eṣa subhūte tathāgatasyākṣayam
S06psp_4u:585_2_3: iti yāvan nirvāṇam iti ceti codyapūrvakas tathāgatakaruṇāniṣpandanirdeśaḥ.
S06psp_4u:586_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:586_1: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathāgatena deśyate,
S06psp_4u:586_2: sā ca dharmatā anabhilapyā yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi,
S06psp_4u:587_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, sarvadharmāḥ subhūte anabhilapyā,
S06psp_4u:587_1: yā subhūte dharmāṇām anabhilapyatā sā śūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:588_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann anabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā?
S06psp_4u:589_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇir.
S06psp_4u:590_0: subhūtir āha: saced bhagavann anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇiḥ,
S06psp_4u:590_1: dānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_2: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_3: prajñāpāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_4: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_5: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_6: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_7: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām āryasatyānāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānaṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_8_0: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na vṛddhir
S06psp_4u:590_8_1: na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_4u:590_8_2: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_9: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:590_10: saced bhagavann āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_11: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:590_12: tadā abhavyā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum ity anabhilapyasya hānivṛddhyā bhāvena codyam.
S06psp_4u:591_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, nānabhilapyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā.
S06psp_4u:591_1: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyamānasyopāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:591_10: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:174) caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_4u:591_12_0: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś
S06psp_4u:591_12_1: cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati yathānuttarā
S06psp_4u:592_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:592_1: katamā ca punar bhagavann anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06psp_4u:594_0: subhūtir āha: katamaiṣā bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā yānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06psp_4u:595_0: bhagavān āha: yā subhūte rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyās tathatā yā saṃjñayāḥ tathatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā yā vijñānasya tathatā,
S06psp_4u:595_1: evaṃ yā skandhatathatā yā dhātutathatā yā āyatanatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā,
S06psp_4u:595_2: evaṃ yāvad yā nirvāṇasya tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:595_4: tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito 'bhīksṇaṃ bahulaṃ viharati,
S06psp_4u:595_5: na kasyacid dharmasya vṛddhiṃ vā parihāṇiṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:595_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:595_7: evaṃ ca subhūte dānapāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:595_8: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
