S06psp_4u:678_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā tribhiḥ kleśaiḥ kliṣṭān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:678_3: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre trayaḥ kleśā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante.
S06psp_4u:678_5: sarvasattvāś ca vigatarāgā bhaviṣyanti vigatadveṣā vigatamohā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:678_6: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:679_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā hīnādhimuktikān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:679_2_0: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyāmi sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ
S06psp_4u:679_2_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre dvayor yānayoḥ śabdo na bhaviṣyati
S06psp_4u:679_5: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:680_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratābhimānikān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:680_3: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre 'bhimānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ śabdo 'pi na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate,
S06psp_4u:680_5: evaṃ caran (PSP_4:189) subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ piripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:681_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:681_2: sacet me tatra buddhakṣetre mitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ syād mitā ca prabhā,
S06psp_4u:681_3: mitaś ca bhikṣusaṃghaḥ, api tu khalu tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:681_5: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre amitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:681_6: amitā ca prabhā, amitaś ca bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:681_7: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:682_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:682_1: yāvanti gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāvanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ yāvan na bhaven na tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
S06psp_4u:682_2: 'pi tu khalu tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:682_4: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya yāvanti gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bhavanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:682_5: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:683_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:683_1: dīrgho batāyaṃ saṃsāro, bahur ayaṃ sattvadhātus tenaivaṃ yoniśo manasikartavyam,
S06psp_4u:683_4: na ceha kaścit saṃsariṣyati, na ca kaścit parinirvāsyati. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:684_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi gaṅgadevā nāma bhaginī saṃnipatitābhut saṃniṣaṇṇā,
S06psp_4u:684_1: sotthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jāmumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:684_2_0: 190) bhagavantam etad avocat: ahaṃ bhagavann ahaṃ sugata ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvaivaṃrūpaṃ
S06psp_4u:684_2_1: buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhīṣye yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddheneha prajñāpāramitāyām
S06psp_4u:685_0: atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpaṃ gṛhītvā,
S06psp_4u:685_1: rūpyapuṣpaṃ ca gṛhītvā, jalajāni sthalajāni ca puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā,
S06psp_4u:685_2: sarvāṇi cābharaṇāni gṛhītvā, suvarṇavarṇapītavarṇaṃ ca puṣpayugaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tena kṣipati sma.
S06psp_4u:685_3: samanantarakṣiptaṃ ca tad dūṣyayugam atha tāvad eva buddhānubhāvenopari vaihāyasam antarīkṣe bhagavato mūrdhni saṃdhau kūṭāgāram asthāt,
S06psp_4u:685_4: caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ samaṃ bhāgaśo ghaṭitaṃ suvibhaktaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
S06psp_4u:686_0: atha khalu sā strīs tatkūṭāgāraṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_4u:687_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ striyā adhyāśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot,
S06psp_4u:687_1: dharmatā khalu punar eṣā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitaṃ prāduḥ kurvanti.
S06psp_4u:688_0: atha khalu tāvad evānekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo bhagavato mukhadvārād niścaranti sma.
S06psp_4u:688_1_0: tadyathāpi nāma nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātā māñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikarajatavarṇās tān anantāparyantān
S06psp_4u:688_1_1: lokadhātūn gatvā punar evāgatya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhny
S06psp_4u:689_0_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ cīvaraṃ pravaritvā dakṣiṇaṃ
S06psp_4u:689_0_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam
S06psp_4u:689_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayaḥ? smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
S06psp_4u:690_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:690_1_0: iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06psp_4u:690_1_1: loke bhaviṣyati tārakopame kalpe 'yam ānanda etasyā gaṅgadevāyā bhaginyāś caramaḥ
S06psp_4u:690_2: iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivarjya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhyākṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre upapatsyate abhiratyāṃ lokadhātau,
S06psp_4u:690_4: asya khalu punar ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya suvarṇapuṣpa iti nāmadheyaṃ (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:690_5: 191) bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punar ānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tataś cyutaḥ samāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:690_7: tadyathāpi nāṃ ānanda rājā cakravartī prāsādena prāsādaṃ caṅkrāmati,
S06psp_4u:690_8: sa yāvajjīvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ nākrāmati yāvan maraṇakālam iti.
S06psp_4u:690_9: evam evānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:691_1: yāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tatra buddhaksetre saṃnipatitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:692_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasā cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:692_2_0: tathāgatasaṃnipātaḥ sa veditavyo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ suvarṇapuṣpasya
S06psp_4u:692_2_1: ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhaksetre na pramāṇabaddho bhikṣusaṃgho
S06psp_4u:692_3: na śakyaṃ tasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pramāṇaṃ kartum,
S06psp_4u:692_4: iyanto vā śrāvakā, iyanti vā śrāvakaśatāni, iyanti vā śrāvakasahasrāṇi, iyanti vā śrāvakaśatasahasrāṇi,
S06psp_4u:692_5: iyatyo vā śrāvakakoṭya, iyanti vā śrāvakakoṭīśatāni, iyanti vā śrāvakakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi,
S06psp_4u:692_8_0: suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punar ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānuttarāṃ
S06psp_4u:692_8_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetra ime doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā
S06psp_4u:693_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:693_1: kva bhagavann etayā gaṅgadevayā kuśalamūlam avaropitam?
S06psp_4u:694_0: bhagavān āha: dīpaṅkarasyānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike etayā bhaginyā kuśalamūlam avaropitam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
S06psp_4u:694_1: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ,
S06psp_4u:694_2: sa ca dīpaṅkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpair abhyavakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā,
S06psp_4u:694_3: yadā mayā ānanda dīpaṃkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pañcabhir (PSP_4:
S06psp_4u:694_5_0: tadāhaṃ tena dīpaṃkareṇa bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena kuśalamūlasamanvāgato
S06psp_4u:694_5_1: 'yam iti viditvā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvani
S06psp_4u:694_5_2: sākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
S06psp_4u:694_5_3: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho bhagavāṃs tadā
S06psp_4u:694_5_4: mamaitayā bhaginyā vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittam utpāditam,
S06psp_4u:694_6: aho batāham apy anāgate 'dhvani evaṃ vyākriyeyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:694_8: evam ānandaitayā bhaginyā tasya dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamaṃ cittam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye samutpāditam.
S06psp_4u:695_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:695_1: kṛtaparikarmā bhagavann iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:696_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda evam etat, yathā vadasi, kṛtaparikarmā ānandaiṣā gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:697_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:697_1_0: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ
S06psp_4u:697_1_1: kartavyaḥ? kathaṃ śūnyatā bhāvayitavyā? katham ānimitte parijayaḥ? katham ānimittaṃ
S06psp_4u:697_1_2: bhāvayitavyam? katham apraṇihite parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ? katham apraṇihitaṃ bhāvayitavyaṃ?
S06psp_4u:697_1_3: yāvat kathaṃ bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ? kathaṃ bodhipakṣyā dharmā
S06psp_4u:698_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:698_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣitavyam,
S06psp_4u:698_2: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣitavyam,
S06psp_4u:698_6: evaṃ yāvat kāmadhātuḥ śūnya iti pratyavekṣitavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:698_9: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyaṃ, yathā pratyavekṣamāṇas tac cittaṃ na vikṣipati,
S06psp_4u:698_11: yo dharmaḥ sākṣātkriyeta, sa taṃ dharmam (PSP_4:193) asamanupaśyan na sākṣātkaroti.
S06psp_4u:698_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmaiḥ suśikṣito na kasyacid dharmasya vyavacchedaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:698_13: yo vā sākṣātkuryād, yaṃ vā sākṣātkuryād, yena vā sākṣātkuryāt, sarvāṃs tān dharmān na saṃyuktān na visaṃyuktān samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:699_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:699_1: yad bhagavān evam āha, na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyā dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyā iti.
S06psp_4u:699_2: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
S06psp_4u:700_0: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06psp_4u:700_4: nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate.
S06psp_4u:700_5: asamāhita eva bodhisattvo mahāsattva āraṃbaṇe cittam upanibadhnāti,
S06psp_4u:700_6: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣair dharmair,
S06psp_4u:700_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? evam udārajñānasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:700_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? yo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sthita evaṃ jānāti parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti.
S06psp_4u:701_0: tena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:701_1_0: dānapāramitāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ, śīlapāramitāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ, kṣāntipāramitāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:701_1_1: vīryapāramitāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ, dhyānapāramitāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ, prajñāpāramitāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:701_2: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya bhāvanāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:701_4: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:701_10: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratilābhāyāyaṃ kālaḥ pratisaṃvitpratilābhāyāyaṃ kālo,
S06psp_4u:702_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran śūnyatāyāṃ ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:702_1: śūnyatayā ca viharaty, ānimitte ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:702_2: ānimittena ca viharaty, apraṇihite ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:702_3: apraṇihitena ca viharati. smṛtyupasthānāni ca bhāvayati smṛtyupasthānaiś ca viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti.
S06psp_4u:702_5: āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ ca mārgañ ca bhāvayaty āryāṣṭāṅgikena ca mārgeṇa viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti.
S06psp_4u:703_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:703_1: bodhipakṣyāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayati bodhipakṣyaiś ca dharmair viharati,
S06psp_4u:703_2: na ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti na ca sakṛdāgāmiphalan na cānāgāmiphalan nārhattvaphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti.
S06psp_4u:704_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣaḥ śūraś ca bhaved,
S06psp_4u:704_1: vīraś ca bhaved, dṛḍhapratiṣṭhānaś ca bhaved, abhirūpaś ca bhavet, prāsādikaś ca bhaved, darśanīyaś ca bhavet, paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataś ca bhaved,
S06psp_4u:704_4: sarvāsu ca catuḥṣaṣṭhiṣu kalāsu pariniṣpanno bhavet,
S06psp_4u:704_5: sarvatra ca śilpasthāneṣu ca karmasthāneṣu ca gatiṃgato bhavet,
S06psp_4u:704_7: sa yāṃ yām eva ca kāṃścit kriyām ārabheta sarvatra tatra tatra ca lābhasatkārasamanvāgato bhavet,
S06psp_4u:704_8: tena ca bahujanaṃ satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet,
